With support from Kiva, Sithokozile will purchase clothing in bulk from wholesalers so that she can merchandise at a reduced cost and sell it for a profit. With additional profits, she plans to expand her business, create employment in her community and also cater for the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in bulk

loans.name: Ram

texts.en:
Ram thanks all Kiva Lenders for helping him in purchasing fertilizers and pesticides. He has repaid his loan to Kiva lenders on time and could save some money for the future of his family and also pay the fees of his children's education.

He approaches Seva MFI and Kiva lenders for another loan of 10,000 SRD to purchase fertilizers and pesticides and continue production.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Wendbenedo Group

texts.fr:
Mme POKO ANNE est responsable du groupe WENDBENEDO. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 13ans et le moins âgé a 03ans.03 va à l’école. Elle a 05 personnes en charge.
Mme vend des habits, chaussures et pagnes depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. 
Elle veut s’acheter  15 pièces de pagnes, 25paires de chaussures et 15douzaines d’habits pour enfants.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut  réinvestir  dans son activité. Elle ambitionne toujours s’acheter une parcelle et mieux entretenir ses enfants.
texts.en: Poko Anne is the leader of the Wendbenedo Group. She is being kept very busy. She is a married mother to three children. The eldest is 13 years old and the youngest is three years old. All three children are currently receiving an education. She has a total of five people living under her care. Poko Anne has been selling clothing, shoes, and pagne cloth for the past 10 years. She gets her supplies from her local market. She would like to buy 15 sheets of pagne cloth, 25 pairs of shoes, and 15 dozen children's outfits. With these earnings, she wants to reinvest in her business. She actively works towards buying her own plot of land and being able to better provide for her children.

loans.use: to purchase 15 sheets of pagne cloth, 25 pairs of shoes, and 15 dozen children's outfits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: María tiene 58 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo. María se dedica a la elaboración y vena de pan dulce y francés desde hace 30 años. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante y gracias a la experiencia que posee en el negocio ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día demandan más sus productos. María desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas para la vivienda y además, desea repellar las paredes de la vivienda para lo cual necesita arena y cemento.
texts.en: María is 58 years old and she lives in her own house with her husband. María has worked selling sweet and french bread for 30 years. She sells as a street vendor and thanks to her experience in the business she has a lot of customers and every day the demand for her products increases. María wants to improve her living conditions and so she has decided to ask FUSAI for a loan to invest in buying doors and windows for her house. She also wants to cover the walls of the house and needs sand and cement.

loans.use: to buy doors, windows, sand and cement to cover the walls of her house and make it more secure.

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños/as, además ofrece a sus clientes diversidad de cosméticos y otros accesorios de uso personal, tiene un puesto en el mercado de su comunidad y también lo hace de manera ambulante, trabaja desde todos los días desde hace 10 años y le colabora su familia. La Sra.: María vive junto a sus dos hijos de 17 y 10 años de edad, ella se siente feliz porque con sus esfuerzos puede cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia.
El crédito que está solicitando lo utilizara en comprar blusas, faldas, pantalones, camisas, ropa interior, lociones, antitranspirantes, labiales, bases, polvos, sombras, etc., son productos que forman parte de un pedido que está por recibir, espera surtir su inventario para continuar teniendo los ingresos que necesita y resarcir su deuda.
Su sueño es brindar a sus hijos el apoyo necesario para que logren estudiar y culminar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
María sells clothing for men, women, and children.  She also offers her customers a variety of cosmetics and other accessories for personal care.  She has a space in the market in her community and also sells as a street vendor.  She has worked every day for 10 years and her family helps her.

María lives with her two children, ages 17 and 10.  She's happy because with her efforts she's able to cover her family's basic needs.

She'll use the loan she's requesting to buy blouses, skirts, pants, shirts, underwear, lotion, antiperspirant, lipstick, foundation, powder, eyeshadow, etc.  These products are part of a request she's about to receive.  She hopes to stock her inventory so she can continue to have the income she needs and pay back her debt.

Her dream is to give her children the support they need to go to school and complete a college education.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto tiene 54 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos, en una comunidad grande en la zona rural de San Nicolas, una zona rural del Distrito de Zaña, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, gracias a que está ubicada cercana al valle del río Jequetepeque, comercio de los granos y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales como chivos, carneros y cerdos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mismos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Alberto is 54 years old and lives with his wife and children in a large community in the rural area of San Nicolas, which is in Saña District, in Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region, on the northern coast of Peru. The people of his community work in agriculture, selling grains and raising livestock, thanks to their proximity to the valley of the river Jequetepeque.

Alberto works raising and selling animals such as goats, sheep and pigs. His business is located in the back part of his property. He is requesting this loan of 2,000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed to raise his animals. He hopes to improve his income for his family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to raise animals such as goats, sheep and pigs.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: El señor Pedro tiene 63 años, casado tiene un hijito de la edad de 29 años, se  dedica a la actividad de sastrería el confecciona trajes y pantalones según pedido, el  tiene su sastrería que se encuentra ubicado en la localidad de Batallas,  este es su primer crédito con la institución y el  señor Pedro va a usar este préstamo para  la compra de una maquina industrial y así de esta manera incrementar la tela para la confección de pantalones de vestir  ya que tiene mucha demanda de sus productos, el señor Pedro tiene muchos pedidos que tiene que entregar ya que por estas fechas hay desfiles de escolares de instituciones públicas por el aniversario de la ciudad y de la localidad, el señor Pedro es una persona muy trabajadora tiene ganas de seguir adelante de mejorar  su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Pedro is 63 years old. He is married and has a 29 year old son. He works as a tailor, making suits and pants to order. He has his shop in the locality of Batallas. This is his first loan with the institution and Pedro is going to use this loan to buy an industrial sewing machine so he can increase the amount of fabric for making dress pants. There is a lot of demand for his product. Pedro has a lot of orders to deliver around this time with school parades from public institutions for the locality's and  city's anniversary. Pedro is a very hardworking person who really wants to get ahead and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make pants.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en: Sharon is a 19-year-old businesswoman living with her parents and siblings in Umguza district in Zimbabwe. Sharon has been selling clothes at a flea market for the past eight months. She also gives back to her community by volunteering to support children who have dropped out of school. With the loan from Kiva, Sharon hopes to purchase more clothing for her stall. She intends to use any additional proceeds to enroll in nursing school and train as a nurse.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Amado

texts.es:
Amado tiene 48 años de edad, casado con 3 hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como patos, gallos, gallinas, pollos, cuyes, desde varios años, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de un vehículo motorizado que le permita trasladar a pasajeros por zonas aledañas a su distrito y de esta manera generar ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Amado is 48 years old, married, and has three children. He lives with his family in Oyotún District, in Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region, on the northern coast of Peru. He lives in a rural area, where the population works in agriculture, trade and raising livestock.

He has worked for several years raising and selling animals such as ducks, chickens, chicks and guinea pigs. His business is located in the back part of his property. He is requesting this loan of 2,000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a motorized vehicle to carry passengers around neighboring areas of his district. He hopes to make additional income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a motorized vehicle to carry passengers around his district.

loans.name: Veronica Beatriz

texts.es:
Verónica, está soltera, vive junto a su madre y su abuela, se mantiene al pendiente de lo que su familia necesita; su actividad económica con la que genera ingresos es la venta de panes con pollo, hoy dogs, refrescos naturales, sodas, jugos, etc., es un negocio que heredó de su madre, lo realiza desde hace 5 años, hasta la fecha no ha tenido ningún problema en realizar dicho negocio.
Utilizará el crédito para comprar pan, embutidos, aderezos, tomates, sodas, jugos, piñas, sandías, azúcar, bolsas, servilletas, pollo y condimentos, espera tener capital para abastecer su inventario cada vez que sea necesario y así mantenerse trabajando para mejorar su situación económica.
Su visión es ampliar su negocio con la apertura de una tienda y apoyar a su madre en finalizar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Verónica is single. She lives with her mother and her grandmother. She keeps track of what her family needs. Her economic activity with which she generates income is selling chicken sandwiches, hot dogs, natural juices, sodas, juice, etc. She inherited this business from her mother and has been doing it for 5 years. So far, she hasn't had any problems with the business. 

She will use the loan to buy bread, deli meats, toppings, tomatoes, sodas, juices, pineapples, watermelons, sugar, napkins, chicken and seasonings. She hopes to have the capital to stock her inventory whenever its necessary and thus keep working to improve her financial situation. Her vision is to enlarge the business by opening a store and helping her mother finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy bread, deli meats, toppings, tomatoes, sodas, juices, pineapples, watermelon, sugar, bags, napkins, chicken and seasonings.

loans.name: Beauty

texts.en: Beauty is a 25-year-old business woman. She lives in the Matobo District of Zimbabwe, where she has been successfully operating a grocery shop selling sugar, snacks, cooking oil, washing soap and tea leaves. Apart from running her business, she also volunteers as a Learner Guide delivering Better World sessions to students in schools. The sessions focus on developing study and life skills. With the requested loan she plans to purchase more stock to improve her sales, and with the additional profits she plans to pay school fees for her siblings.

loans.use: to purchase more stock like sugar, snacks, cooking oil, washing soap and tea leaves to improve her sales.

loans.name: Lisedi

texts.en: Lisedi is a 28-year-old businesswoman living in the Matobo District of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully operating a grocery store for eight months now. Lisedi is also a community health activist who disseminates health information to the people of her community.  With the requested loan she intends to make bulk purchases of mealie-meal, rice, flour, sugar, salt, cooking oil and milk in order to boost her sales and profit margins. With the additional profits she intends to build her own shop.

loans.use: to purchase more mealie-meal, rice, flour, sugar, salt, cooking oil and milk in order to boost her sales.

loans.name: Anish

texts.en:
Anish is feeling blessed with the help of Kiva lenders. He thanks them a lot. Anish is a very hardworking and dedicated farmer. With the profits of his rice cultivation last season, he could save for his marriage.

Anish wants now to save for the future of his family and for a pickup truck. That’s why he has expanded his rice production. For the purchase of fertilizer and pesticides, he is asking Kiva lenders for another loan of 8000 SRD.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Rosa Estebana

texts.es: Rosa  tiene la edad  de 56 años  es de una comunidad  llamada valle la picota es una mujer luchadora  madre de 6 hijos los cuales junto con su esposo los han sacado adelante , su esposo se dedica a la agricultura  siembra de granos básicos así como también  ajonjolí y sandia . Con esfuerzo y trabajo han llegado a tener un hogar digno, tiene  ganado y tierras  que son las que cultivan para sacar para el consumo del hogar y también vender para así comprar otras cosas. En esta comunidad no tienen energía eléctrica, así que ellos hacen uso de candiles o phocos por las noches y madrugada para poder alumbrarse. Por tal razón y sintiendo mucho la necesidad de tener luz en su vivienda ella quiere un préstamo para comprar un sistema solar para instalarlo en su hogar así toda su familia será beneficiada.
texts.en:
Rosa is 56 years old and is from a community called Valle La Picota. She is a hardworking mother of six children, whom, along with her husband, she has raised and provided for. Her husband works in agriculture, growing basic grains, sesame and watermelon.

With a lot of effort and hard work they have built a comfortable home, with livestock and fields they use to produce food for the home as well as to sell so that they can buy other items.

They do not have electricity in their community, so they use oil lamps and flashlights at night and in the early mornings.
For this reason and because they really feel the need to have electricity in their home, Rosa is requesting this loan to buy a solar system to install in their home, from which all of the family would benefit.

loans.use: to buy a solar system to install in her home so her family can have electricity.

loans.name: Thobekile

texts.en: Thobekile is a 19-year-old businesswoman living in Kwekwe district of Zimbabwe with her parents and siblings. She has been running the grocery shop for the past one year with assistance from the family. Thobekile is also a member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae network who works with other members in her district by assisting the elderly in their fields and fetching water for them. With the Kiva loan that she is requesting, Thobekile intends to buy cooking oil, washing soap, cotton wool, salt, matches and sugar in bulk. This would help her to benefit from high sales and increased profits. With additional profits, she hopes to expand and have more branches of her business. With more branches, she can create employment for her community and assist her parents and siblings financially.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, washing soap, cotton wool, salt, matches and sugar in bulk.

loans.name: Yvrose

texts.en: Yvrose has been used her kiva loan purchase EarthSpark clean energy products on a resale basis in her community so that she could pay monthly school for her two daughters. She has already taken out four loans and made the payment in full, thus; she comes back to us to take a new one.

loans.use: to purchase stock for a clean energy business.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina de 49 años de edad, sus padres con mucho esfuerzo lograron que pudiese cursar hasta un quinto grado,  ya que eran de muy escasos recursos económicos y la familia era bastante numerosa, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad y solo uno esta con ella la menor, los demás tienen su propia familia formada.

Desde muy pequeña Reina, se ha dedicado a trabajar la tierra cultivando maíz en compañía de sus hermanos, ya que siendo una familia de muy escasos recursos tenían que trabajar y ahorrase el pago de mosos, también le ayudaba a su madre en los oficios del hogar, luego se acompañó. Entonces junto a su pareja se dedicaban al cultivo de maíz, a ella  no se le hizo  difícil ya que a esa misma actividad se dedicaba cuando estaba con sus padres, esta relación duro poco tiempo; ya que su compañero la abandono y ella se dedicó a criar a sus hijos por su propio esfuerzo y trabajo y con ayuda de su hijo mayor, también se dedica a los oficios domésticos en  casa ajenas para llevar el sustento diario a su familia.

El préstamo que esta solicitado es para comprar fertilizantes, abonos y para la preparación de la tierra para el cultivo de maíz.

Su deseo es sacar adelante a sus hijos, darles el estudio hasta donde sea posible ya que manifestó que hoy en día es necesario tener un estudio para que puedan desarrollarse como persona y económicamente.
texts.en:
Reina is 49 years old. Her parents, with great effort, managed to send her to school through fifth grade, since they were of very scarce economic resources and the family was quite numerous. Her children are already adults, and only one is with her, the youngest. The others have formed their own families.

Since she was very young, Reina has worked the land, raising corn together with her siblings, since, being a family of very scarce resources, they had to work and save the cost of labor. She also helped her mother with the household tasks. Later she got married. Then, along with her partner, they raised corn. This was not difficult for her, since she worked at this same activity when she was with her parents. This relationship lasted only a little while, since her partner abandoned her, and she raised her children through her own effort and work and with the help of her oldest son. She also does domestic work in other homes to bring daily sustenance to her family.

The loan that she is applying for is to buy fertilizers and compost and to prepare the land to raise corn.

Her wish is to help her children get ahead and give them as much education as possible, since she states that now it is necessary to have an education to be able to develop as a person and economically.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and compost and prepare the land to raise corn.

loans.name: Inerai

texts.en:
Inerai has used his kiva loan to buy Eneji Pwop products to resell with their farmer colleagues in his locality.He has used the profit of this loan to pay monthly school for their children.
After selling his entire stock and repaid his loan in full, now he is coming back to us to take a 2nd loan.

loans.use: To stock clean energy retail business

loans.name: Auguste

texts.en: Auguste used to sell his stock in front of a big public market each Tuesday and Friday in his area that helped him to get access to have his stock sold faster. After fully repaying his fourth loan, now he's coming back to us to take out his fifth loan to buy more stock to grow his store up.

loans.use: To purchase stock for a clean energy business

loans.name: Mirian Dianet

texts.es:
Mirian Dianet tiene 27 años de edad, vive sola con su menor hija de 7 años, en el distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza como cremas, cosméticos, perfumes, joyas, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en una vitrina en la sala de su domicilio, también tiene una bodeguita donde ofrece variedad de productos como leche, menestras, huevos, aceite entre otros.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de productos de primera necesidad para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Mirian Dianet, 27, lives alone with her young daughter, 7, in the Callayuc district, located in Cutervo Province in the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.  The people there work in agriculture, commerce, and ranching.

She earns a living selling beauty products such as creams, cosmetics, perfume, and jewelry.  Her business is located in a display case in the living room of her home.  She also has a little store where she offers a variety of products, including milk, beans, eggs, and oil.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan for 3,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy staples in bulk to stock her business so she can earn more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy staple products

loans.name: Alejandrino Santiago Soledad's Group

texts.en:
The group composed by Alejandrino, Ateogenes and Priciliana live in the community Cabeza de Arrollo Granizo, Xochistlahuaca, located in Guerrero state. 
A lot of people in this community don't have access to electricity. This situation represents a big problem when they want to keep working on their crafts at night. Priciliana needs to be able to perform these activities for longer per day for increasing her earnings for living expenses.

Even though she receives money in exchange for selling their crafts, her income is tight, and also because of the lack of access to electricity they have to spend a great part of the money on buying alternative light sources, like diesel or candles, also during the day she have to spend time attending her home tasks or field work. Therefore, Priciliana can be sure that, when acquiring a solar lighting system, the times in which she can be productive and her working schedule can be longer and she will be able to achieve a higher income.

loans.use: To purchase a solar home system.

location.town: Cabeza de Arroyo Granizo, Xochistlahuaca, Guerrero

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
Maura es una mujer emprendedora, tiene 57 años de edad, y vive en San Vicente junto a su familia. Tiene 5 hijos quienes son su mayor orgullo y por quienes trabaja día a día para poder brindarles un futuro mejor.
Desde hace más de 10 años trabaja en los campos agrícolas de la zona de San Vicente, le va muy bien porque es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y porque es muy dedicada a su trabajo.
Maura está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá construir su casa de material noble ya que en la actualidad lo tiene construido con adobe. De esta manera su casa será más segura y sentirá mayor comodidad viviendo en ella.
texts.en:
Maura, 57, is an enterprising woman who lives in San Vicente with her family.  She has five children who are her greatest pride and for whom she works every day so she can give them a better future.

She has worked in the agricultural fields in the San Vicente area for more than 10 years.  It's going very well for her because she's a very hardworking, responsible person, and because she's very dedicated to her job.

Maura's grateful to the Kiva lenders because with their support she'll be able to build her house of quality materials.  Currently it's made of adobe.  That way her house will be more secure and she'll feel more comfortable living in it.

loans.use: to build her house

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David de 47 años de edad, no sabe leer ni escribir debido a que cuando él tenía la edad para estudiar en el lugar donde vivía no habían escuelas, para ir a una escuela tenía que transportarse lejos de su casa y por el transporte se le hacía muy difícil a su familia poder llevarlo y también debido a la situación económica no tenían para poder mandarlo a la escuela.

Él es casado no tiene hijos,  su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su casa solamente vive él y su esposa.

David es comerciante se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, comenta que se dedica a este negocio debido a que cuando era pequeño trabajaba ayudándole a un tío a llevar el ganado a su casa y fue entonces que a él le gusto este negocio y decidió dedicarse a su propio negocio y lleva más de 20 años en la ganadería, comenta que compra ganado en varios lugares del país debido a contactos que le informan o clientes, y que para llevar el ganado a su casa lo hace en camiones de ganado, su esposa le apoya en las cosas que ella pueda, él no tiene un horario de trabajo debido a que para desplazarse a lugares a comprar tiene que quedarse a dormir fuera de casa por la distancia de su casa. 


   El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar ganado lechero debido a que las ventas de ganado criollo son bajas, él quiere comprar vacas lecheras para que sus ganancias sean más y así poder ayudar en los gastos de su hogar y poder darle  una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa.

David  desea para el futuro tener un gran negocio de transportación de ganado a otros lugares y poder tener una mejor  calidad de vida junto a su esposa, y comenta que todo esto puede llegar a ser posible gracias al crédito que se le ha sido otorgado y poder en un futuro tener otro de más alto para poder hacer realidad su sueño.
texts.en:
David is 47 years old. He does not read or write, because when he was the age to go to school there where no schools where he lived. To go to school it was necessary to travel far from his home. It was very difficult for his family to arrange for such travel, and combined with their financial situation, they were not able to send him to school.

David is married and he does not have any children. His wife does the household work in their home where only he and his wife live.

David works buying and selling cattle. He says that he started working in this business because, when he was little, he worked helping an uncle bring the cattle to his house. It was then that he realized that he liked this type of work, so he decided to start his own cattle business, which he has had now for over 20 years. He says that he buys cattle in various parts of the country on the basis of information from business contacts or customers. He then hauls the cattle to his house in cattle trucks. His wife helps him with the things she can. He does not have a fixed work schedule, because he needs to sleep away from home when he travels the long distances to the different places where he buys cattle.

He is requesting this loan from CrediCampo to buy dairy cattle, as sales for the "Criollo" breed of cattle are low. He would like to buy dairy cows to increase his profits and pay for household expenses. He hopes to give his wife a better quality of life.

In the future, David would like to have a large cattle transportation business so that he and his wife could enjoy a better quality of life. He says that all of this could be possible and his dream could become reality thanks to this loan and possibly another larger loan in the future.

loans.use: to buy dairy cattle for his cattle sales business.

loans.name: Wildor

texts.es:
Cruz Wildor tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil casado, tiene 3 hijos, vive con su familia en el Distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como patos, gallos, gallinas, pollos, pavos, desde hace varios años, los alimenta con granos naturales de la zona, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Altenativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de animales y de esta manera engorarlos y ofrecerlos a un mayor precio.
texts.en: Cruz Wildor is 40 years old, is married and has 3 children. He lives with his family in the Oyotun district, a community that works in agriculture, commerce and livestock.  It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which is part of the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.  He has worked for several years raising and selling animals such as ducks, chickens, and turkeys.  He feeds them with local, natural grains.  He has requested a loan through Edpyme Alternativa of 2,000 nuevos soles to buy a variety of animals, in order to fatten them up and sell them at a higher price.

loans.use: to buy animals to fatten up.

loans.name: Jose Gilberto

texts.es:
José, nuevamente solicita capital, en esta ocasión lo utilizara para comprar abono, semilla, fertilizantes, plaguicidas, herbicidas e insecticidas, de esta manera eliminara la maleza del terreno y evitara la amenaza de plagas en el cultivo de maíz.
El préstamo anterior le facilito el pago de mano de obra y tener equipo adecuado para procesar la cosecha, sus ingresos son de subsistencia y los utilizo para cancelar su deuda y cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia.
texts.en: Jose is requesting another loan to buy manure, seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides and insecticides. He hopes to eliminate the weeds from his land and avoid infestations in his corn crop. He used his previous loan to pay for the labor and equipment needed to harvest his crop. He earns just enough income to pay off his debts and pay for basic necessities for his family.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides and insecticides for his corn crop.

loans.name: Roopchand

texts.en:
Roopchand is feeling blessed and is very grateful to Kiva lenders for helping him with his rice production. With the profits of last season, he bought school books for his children.

He has repaid his loan to Kiva lenders on time and requests them to lend him SRD 10,000 once more for purchasing fertilizers and pesticides for his rice production.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is a young businesswoman of 24 years and lives in the Matobo district of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully operating a grocery shop, where she sells tea leaves, rice, cooking oil, mealie-meal and snacks. Daisy also volunteers with Camfed in the Better World program, where she delivers well-being sessions to students at the local secondary school. 

With the requested loan, she intends to expand her business and make bulk purchases of the groceries at lower costs from wholesalers so that she can receive higher sales. With these additional profits, she plans to help needy children in her community and better provide for her family.

loans.use: To make bulk purchases of the groceries at lower costs from wholesalers.

loans.name: Sinanisiwe

texts.en: Sinanisiwe is a young businesswoman. She is 26 years old and lives in the Matobo District of Zimbabwe where she has been successfully selling hair extensions for two years. She intends to use the loan to purchase weaves, cosmetics, braids, hair sprays, nail polish, and perfumes. When she is not tending to her business, she serves as a community health activist disseminating health information to children at the primary school in her community.  With the additional profits made possible by her loan, she hopes to open a salon and create employment in her community.

loans.use: To purchase more stock: weaves, cosmetics, braids, hair sprays, nail polish, and perfumes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell

loans.name: Modester

texts.en:
Modester is a 26-year-old entreprenuer living in Kwekwe District in Zimbabwe with her two children. She is a successful businesswoman who has been operating a grocery store for the past 11 months with the assistance of one employee. She also volunteers in her community by offering guidance and counseling lessons to teenagers. 

Modester intends to make bulk purchases of sugar, salt, cooking oil, soap and rice with the requested Kiva loan. This will help her increase her sales and profits. The additional profits will be used to expand into a large retail shop, save for a vehicle and create employment for the people in the community.

loans.use: to make bulk purchases of sugar, salt, cooking oil, soap and rice

loans.name: Rudo

texts.en:
Rudo is a 30-year-old businesswoman who is married with two children living in the Kwekwe District of Zimbabwe. She has been running a flea market stand selling clothing for the past nine months with assistance from the family. She also volunteers in her community teaching life skills and well-being lessons, and she also helps with cleaning the local clinic. 

Rudo intends to purchase high quality and fashionable clothes using the Kiva loan requested. This would help her become competitive in the business and increase her sales and profits. With additional profits, she hopes to own her own shop and create employment for the people in her community, as well as provide better quality standards for her family.

loans.use: to purchase high quality and fashionable clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: He will buy more inventory, including slippers.

loans.name: Lady

texts.en: Lady is a 21-year-old single mother of two children living in the Umguza district of Zimbabwe. Lady has worked selling hair products for the past two years while also volunteering as a Camfed Learner Guide presenting sessions on well-being to students. Lady will use the requested Kiva loan to purchase hair products and increase her sales volume. With the additional profits, she hopes to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To purchase hair products and increase her sales volume

loans.name: Qondisile

texts.en:
Twenty-three-year-old businesswoman Qondisile lives in the Umguza district of Zimbabwe with her husband and child. Qondisile has been running a poultry farm for the past year, while still working as a volunteer in her community, where she focuses on creating awareness of children’s rights and the importance of education.  

With the requested loan from Kiva, Qondisile hopes to increase the number of chickens she can produce so she can pay fees for her child and siblings.

loans.use: To buy more chickens to rear and sell.

loans.name: Delicia

texts.es:
Delicia tiene 48 años de edad, soltero, vive en casa propia junto a su hija en el distrito de Zaña. Una comunidad ubicada cerca al valle del río Jequetepeque, lo que le ha permitido desarrollarse mediante la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la preparación de dulces que los ofrece a sus clientes, y moradores de su distrito, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alterntiva de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de una mototaxi que le permitirá alquilarlo y con ello generaría mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Delicia is 48 years old and single. She lives in her own home with her daughter in Zaña District, Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region, on the northern coast of Peru. Her community is located near the Jequetepeque river valley, which has allowed it to develop through agriculture, trade and livestock raising.

Delicia works making sweets, which she sells to customers in her district. Her business is located in her home. She is requesting this loan of 3,000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a mototaxi, which she plans to rent out. She hopes to increase her family's income.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Shirley Emily

texts.es:
Shirley es una joven emprendedora, es soltera, tiene 22 años de edad y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Estudió la carrera de Secretariado Ejecutivo en un Instituto y desde hace 7 meses ejerce su profesión en un Canal de Cable por Televisión, y le va muy bien porque es muy trabajadora, responsable y con muchos deseos de superación.
Shirley está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una cocina ya que todos los días almuerza fuera de casa y gasta mucho dinero. De esta manera podrá ahorrar dinero al cocinar y llevar su almuerzo al trabajo y más adelante comenzar a estudiar otra carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Shirley is a young entrepreneur who is single. She is 22 years old and lives with her family. She studied to be an Executive Secretary in an Institute and for the past 7 months has exercised her profession for a Cable Television channel. Things are going very well for her as she is very hard working, responsible and has a lot of desire to get ahead.

Shirley is grateful to the lenders at Kiva as thanks to their support she can buy a stove as she buys her meals outside the house every day and spends lots of money. This way she can save money by cooking and taking her lunch to work. Later on she wants to study more at university.

loans.use: to buy a stove.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more material so that she can produce a variety of products and improve her sales.

loans.name: Eladio

texts.es:
Eladio tiene 63 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive en su propia casa en el Distrito de Buenos Aires a 40 minutos de Morropon, que cuenta con servicios básicos de agua y luz, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a preparación de pan, en un horno artesanal que el mismo ha construido en su domicilio, para luego distribuirlo en los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alterntiva de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de materiales de construcción para su vivienda y de esta manera tener un lugar agradable para residir.
texts.en:
Eladio is 63 years old,is single and lives in his own house in the District of Buenos Aires, some 40 minutes from Morropon, located in the Piura region on the North Coast of Peru. This area has basic water and electrical services and it's people work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock.

Eladio bakes bread in a traditional oven that he made himself in his home. He sells it in the neighboring communities of his area. He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1500 PEN to buy construction materials for his house. In this way he can have a more agreeable place to live.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: by buy dry fish, bush meat, pepper, etc.

loans.name: Juana Candelaria

texts.es: Juana tiene 32 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo, sus dos hijas de 11 años y 3 años y su hijo de un año de edad. Juana tiene siete años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa nueva en las principales zonas de su localidad. Juana es una mujer muy trabajadora quien junto a su esposo mantienen la economía de su hogar. Juana solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir un cuarto para la cocina para lo cual necesita materiales como: lámina, madera, clavos, etc.
texts.en: Juana is 32 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, two daughters, ages 11 and 3, and one-year-old son. Juana has for seven years worked selling new clothing in the major areas of her municipality. She is a very hardworking woman. She and her husband pay for all of their household expenses. Juana is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy corrugated metal roofing, wood, nails etc. to build a room to house their kitchen.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal roofing, wood, nails etc. to build a room to house her kitchen.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en: Sylvia is a 19-year-old mother of one living in Gokwe South, Zimbabwe. Sylvia has been running a poultry project for nine months. She started the business so that she could be financially independent. To give back to her community, Sylvia volunteers as a Learner Guide at the local secondary school and also assists the elderly in her community with their chores. Sylvia would very much love to improve her business. With the Kiva loan, she will purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase production. The increase in income will help her provide for herself and her child.

loans.use: To purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed

loans.name: Enia

texts.en:
Enia is an 18-year-old business woman successfully operating a small retail shop in her community where she sells a variety of grocery products such as soap, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, juice, salt and mealie-meal. She has been running the business for over a year now and would very much love to improve it. 

In her spare time, she also volunteers in her community as a janitor cleaning the toilets at the local clinic and as a learner guide at the local secondary school.

Enia has high hopes for her business. To help her enterprise grow, she has requested a Kiva loan to buy more supplies for her shop. With increased sales, Enia hopes to create employment in her community and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase more stock

loans.name: Gumercinda

texts.en:
Gumercinda is a small entrepreneur and a client of Kubo.financiero. This is her story:

Gumercinda is 57 years old, is married, and has four children; none of which still depend economically on her. She lives in a house she owns and has been dedicated to commerce for 30 years now. She started in business by helping her sister in a small shop her sister had and decided to open up her own; her husband is also in commerce and has a store nearby.

Gumercinda's store is located on a high street that is very busy. She offers dairy products, groceries, soda, pet food, and much more. She asks for this loan to stock up her store and have more products to offer to her clients.

With the effort she puts into her work, Gumercinda has achieved economic stability for herself and her children. She is proud of having her business and looks forward to make it grow.

loans.use: to stock up her grocery store, specifically with canned goods and dairy products

loans.name: Edith Jhonny

texts.es:
Edith Jhonny tiene 30 años de edad, conviviente con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa propia en el Distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad donde su población es amable de clima variado en esta época, se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de carga en su motocarguera, desde hace varios años, cuenta con clientela fija, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 200 nuevos soles para la compra de calamina y fierro que le permitan construir una parte de su vivienda y de esta manera vivir en un lugar más seguro.
texts.en:
Edith Jhonny is 30 years old, married, and has one son to support. He lives in his own home in Oyotún District, Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region on the northern coast of Peru. The climate in his community is varied at this time of year, and the people are kind and work in agriculture, trade and raising livestock.

He has worked for several years providing cargo service to established customers with his motorized vehicle. He is requesting this loan of 1,200 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy corrugated metal roofing and iron to build part of his house. He hopes to improve the security of his home.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal roofing and iron to build part of his house.

loans.name: Ronald Yaroc

texts.es: Ronald es un joven luchador de la comunidad el mojado estudio hasta cuarto grado de la escuela primaria después se puso a trabajar y cultivar las tierras con su padre, hace unos  meses se casó  y su esposa está embarazada  esto lo tiene muy contento ya que  será papa  , dice que estuvo trabajando un tiempo fuera de Nicaragua  con lo que gano y ahorro   lo invirtió en unas tierras las que ahora cultiva y siembra maíz y frijoles  con esto él puede cubrir los gastos y las necesidades básicas de la familia,  en esta comunidad no tienen energía eléctrica por eso el quiere solicitar crédito para comprar  un sistema solar  ya que ahora que su hijo nazca va hacer de mucha utilidad poder tener energía en el hogar ya que un bebe requiere de mucho cuidado y el estar usando candelas o candiles el humo que es tan dañino   le pueda hacer daño.
texts.en:
Ronald is a young fighter from the community of El Mojado. He studied up to Grade 4 and then he started to work and cultivate the land with his father. He got married a few months ago and his wife is pregnant. He is very happy that he will be a father. He says that he worked outside of Nicaragua for a while and with the money he saved he invested it in some land where he now grows corn and beans. He makes enough money to cover the basic needs of his family.

This community does not have electricity so he wants a loan to buy a solar system. When his child is born it will be very useful having electricity in the house as a baby needs a lot of care. Burning candles or lamps creates a lot of smoke which can be harmful.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy system for his house.

loans.name: Sibusisiwe

texts.en:
Sibusisiwe is a 21-year-old businesswoman. She is married with one child and lives in the Shurugwi District of Zimbabwe.

She was encouraged by other CAMA (Camfed’s alumni network) members to go into business so that she could look after herself and has now been selling groceries for five months. Apart from running her business, she also serves as a Learner Guide at her nearest secondary school assisting students with life and study skills.

With the requested loan, Sibusisiwe intends to buy more groceries from wholesalers at lower costs so that she can sell her products at more favorable prices and attract more customers. With the additional profits, she would be able to pay school fees for her child.

loans.use: to purchase more stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock

loans.name: Dianira

texts.es:
Dianira tiene 51 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y menor hijo de 10 años en el Caserío el Limón, una comunidad rural que pertenece al Distrito de Callayuc, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, cuyes y patos, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de cerdos para cría y engorde que le permitan con el tiempo ofrecerlo a un mayor precio, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Dianira is 51 years old. She lives with her husband and 10 year old son in Caserío el Limón,a rural community that belongs to the District of Callayuc, located in the Province of Cutervo which belongs to Cajamarca Region in the North Andes of Peru. The people work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock.

She raises small animals like chickens, guinea pigs and ducks. Her business is located behind her house. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1500 PEN to buy pigs to raise and fatten. With time this will allow her to sell them at a higher price which will generate greater income for her family.



Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, cuyes y patos, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de cerdos para cría y engorde que le permitan con el tiempo ofrecerlo a un mayor precio, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise and fatten.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is a 20-year-old businesswoman residing in the Kwekwe District of Zimbabwe with her grandparents.

She has been operating a flea market stand for the past year selling men's and women’s clothes and bags. She has not employed anyone to assist her in the business due to her current financial constraints. When she is not working on her flea market, she can be found cleaning the local school and volunteering as a Camfed Learner Guide who takes students through life skills lessons.

Martha intends to purchase high quality and fashionable clothes using the requested Kiva loan.  This would boost her sales and make her a more competitive clothing vendor in her area. With additional profits, she hopes to own a boutique, create employment for the people in her community, meet the financial needs of her grandparents and remain financially independent.

loans.use: to purchase quality products

loans.name: Madres Coraje Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Madres Coraje” conformado por 07 socios emprendedores la gran mayoría de ellos vecinos de la zona. Yamilet de 27 años de edad es soltera. Ella presta servicio informático como redacción de documentos. Hace más de 04 meses que se viene desempeñando en su negocio donde le va bien. Yamilet tiene el deseo de poner su propio local de impresión y fotocopiadora. Es por que solicitó el crédito para la compra de una fotocopiadora. El grupo “Madres Coraje” agradecen el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso. Yamilet se encuentra en la parte posterior es la segunda del lado derecho viste chompa blanca.
texts.en:
The "Madres Coraje" group is made up of seven member entrepreneurs, most of whom are neighbors from the area.

Yamilet is 27 years old and single. She provides secretarial services such as drafting of documents. She has had her business for more than four years now, and it is going well for her. She would like to have her own office space to provide printing and photocopying services. She is requesting this loan to buy a photocopier.

The "Madres Coraje" group is grateful for this loan, since it makes their progress possible.

Yamilet is in the back row of the photograph in the middle, wearing the white sweater.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier for her business.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: La señora Ana tiene 26 años, ella  se dedica  a  la crianza de ganado lechero y a la elaboración y venta de quesos, carne y menudencias, ella vive en la localidad de Karapata, este préstamo es el  primero que tiene con la institución, la señora Ana va a usar este préstamo para compra de un ganado para tener una mejor producción de leche,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es mejorar la producción de leche y por ende mejorar la producción de quesos, la señora Ana enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su negocio y calidad de vida, la señora Ana va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar sus ingresos y para compra de forraje para su ganado, la señora Ana desea para su negocio crecer en la producción y venta de leche, Ella es una persona joven trabajadora y emprendedora con ganas de seguir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 26 years old and works raising dairy cattle and making and selling cheeses, meat and giblets. She lives in the town of Karapata. This is her first loan with Emprender. She will use the loan to buy a cow, with which she hopes to improve her milk and cheese production. Some of the challenges she faces are improving her business and improving her quality of life. She plans to use her profits to buy feed for her cattle. She would like to increase her milk production and sales. She is a very hardworking and entrepreneurial person with a strong desire to get ahead and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Pedro Miguel

texts.es:
Pedro Miguel tiene 31 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar vive en casa propia junto a su cónyuge en el distrito de Morropón, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público mediante su mototaxi, en su domicilio tiene un pequeño negocio donde su esposa le apoya vendiendo arroz, son una familia emprendedora que se esfuerza por tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alterntiva de 4 000 nuevo soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de sacos arroz que le permitirá ofrecerlo a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro Miguel, 31, is in a common-law relationship, and has two school-age children.  He and his partner live in their own home in the district of Morropón, located in the province of the same name, which belongs to the Piura region on Peru’s north coast.  The community is engaged in farming, business, and cattle-raising.

Pedro Miguel is engaged in providing public transportation service through means of his motorcycle taxi.  He also has a small business in his home where his partner helps him sell rice.  They are an enterprising family that is striving to have a better quality of life.

He has requested this loan of 4,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alterntiva to purchase more sacks of rice, which will allow him to offer it to his customers and, in this way, generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice for delivery to small general stores in his district.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
Matilde tiene 53 años de edad, vive en su propia cada junto a su hija en el distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de bebidas refrescantes como jugos y raspadillas, también vende comida preparada por ella misma, los día viernes, sábados y domingos que son los días de mayor comercio en su distrito, su negocio se encuentra cercano al colegio del distrito por lo que cuenta con clientela considerable.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de gaseosas, frugos entre otras bebidas para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Matilde is 53 years old and lives in her own house in the district of Buenos Aires, located in Morropon province which belongs to the Piura region on the North Coast of Peru. It has a hot climate and the people work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock.

Matilde works selling refreshing drinks like juices and shaved ice. She also sells meals prepared by herself. Friday, Saturday and Sunday are her best days as they are the busiest commercial days in her district. Her business is located close to the area's secondary school so there are a lot of clients.

Matilde has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 500 PEN to buy soft drinks and juices amongst other drinks to offer to her clients. In this way she can make more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy refreshing drinks, soft drinks, juices, etc.

loans.name: Tendai

texts.en: Tendai is a 27-year-old businesswoman. She is married with two children whom she lives with in Kwekwe District, Zimbabwe. After realizing she could start a business to earn income to look after her family, Tendai ventured into the business of selling clothes, bags, and hats at the local flea market where she is assisted by family members. When she is not working on her flea market, she is offering guidance and counseling to girls at her local secondary school. Tendai intends to purchase high quality clothes for all ages, and more bags and hats, using the requested loan from Kiva. With additional profits, she hopes to expand the business into a large shop, create employment for the people in her community, and meet the financial needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of clothes.

loans.name: Anastancia

texts.en:
Anastancia is a young businesswoman who lives in the Matobo District of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully operating a flea market, where she sells skirts, men’s shirts, t-shirts, and bags. Anastancia is also a Learner Guide at the nearby secondary school in her community, where she assists students with schoolwork in their study groups.  

With the requested loan from Kiva, she intends to purchase more stock to improve her sales and increase profits. She wants to be a role model in her family and community by creating employment from the additional profits that she will be gaining, once her business expands.

loans.use: to purchase more stock.

loans.name: Doris

texts.en: Doris is an 18-year-old entrepreneur, living in the Umguza District of Zimbabwe. She has worked as a poultry farmer for the past year and would use a loan from Kiva to purchase more feed and vaccines, which would allow her to expand her business. Doris hopes to use the additional proceeds to enroll in an agricultural college.

loans.use: to purchase more chick feed and vaccines.

loans.name: Lusina

texts.en: Lusina is a 34-year-old, married woman with three children. She has a vegetable garden, from which she sells to the members of her community and also to the traveling public. She wants to expand her vegetable garden so that she would be able to have more sales from a variety of vegetables. Thus, she has just joined the SPBD program, in order to gain access to financial assistance. She plans to use this loan to purchase fertilizers, vegetable seeds, rakes, fencing wire, and a wheelbarrow for her plantation business. She hopes that she would be able to save most of her profits, so that she would be able to provide a better living for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, vegetable seeds, rakes, fencing wire,and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Sene

texts.en: Sene is a 28-year-old, woman with three children. She has a small plantation and vegetable garden business, from which she sells to the members of her community and also to the traveling public. She started operating this last year, but she needs financial assistance to expand and further improve her plantation and vegetable garden. Therefore, she has just joined the SPBD program to gain access to financial assistance. With this money, she plans to purchase chemicals, a mist blower, fencing wire, vegetable seeds, and bush knives. She hopes to save a lot of her profits, so that she would be able to help in meeting their family's essential everyday needs.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals, a mist blower, fencing wire, vegetable seeds,and  bush knives.

loans.name: Febbie

texts.en: Febbie is 18 years old and lives in the Umguza district of Zimbabwe with her parents and siblings. Febbie currently works selling household items in a small grocery store as well as volunteers to clean the grounds at local schools. With the loan from Kiva, Febbie hopes to purchase more groceries for her shop to boost her sales volume, which would allow her to assist the vulnerable children in her community.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her grocery store.

loans.name: Mayram

texts.ru:
Майрам молодая жительница района Пяндж. Ей 23 года. Она замужем, но детей еще не имеет. Ее муж в данный момент работает в России. Сама Майрам вместе с родителями занимается сельским хозяйством. На протяжении 4 лет они выращивают огородные культуры. Сейчас время очередных посевов и Майрам необходимо закупить семена и минеральные удобрения. Так как с финансами у них туго, Майрам обратилась за кредитом. Она очень надеется на поддержку. 
В будущем семья Майрам планирует увеличить арендуемый участок земли на 1 га больше и таким образом выращивать больше сельскохозяйственных культур.
texts.en:
Mayram is a young resident of the Pyanj district. She is 23. She is married but has no children yet. Her husband is currently working in Russia. Mayram and her parents work in agriculture. For four years they have grown vegetables. Now it is time to plant the next crop, and Mayram needs to buy seed and fertilizer. Since finances are tight, Mayram has requested a loan. She has high hopes for support. 

In the future, Mayram's family plans to rent one additional hectare of land and thus grow more crops.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.es:
Esmeralda tiene 24 años de edad, vive en una comunidad que cuenta con los servicios básicos de agua y luz, en el Distrito de Salitral, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de plátano, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos y otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de productos que le permitan abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Esmeralda, 24, lives in a community that has basic water and electricity service in the Salitral district, located in Morropón Province in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.  The people there work in agriculture, especially growing bananas, and in commerce and ranching.

She earns a living selling clothing, shoes, and other things.  Her business is located in her home.

Esmeralda has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan for 1,500 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy products wholesale, which will allow her to stock her business and earn more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products

loans.name: Rodrigo Antonio

texts.es: Rodrigo   tiene 29 años  dice el  termino toda la escuela primaria   gracias al apoyo y sacrificio de sus padres, después dice se fue a vivir a la finca de sus abuelos maternos  donde le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra, cuidar el ganado entre otras actividades que hoy en día le son muy útil,  ya que le han permitido ganarse la vida, tiene su hogar vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos actualmente ellos estudian en la escuela de la comunidad,  carecen de tener luz en su vivienda ya que la energía convencional no ha llegado  a esta comunidad por tal razón solicita tramite de crédito para comprar un sistema solar e instalarlo en su  vivienda .
texts.en:
Rodrigo, age 29, says that he completed all of elementary school thanks to the support and sacrifice of his parents.  Afterwards, he says that he went to live on his maternal grandparents’ farm.  That is where they taught him to work the land and to care for livestock, among other things that are now very useful to him.  They have allowed him to earn a living and have his home.

He lives with a wife and his three children, who are currently attending the community school.  They do not have light at their house because conventional energy has not come to this community.  That is the reason that he is requesting a loan to buy a solar system and to install it at his house.

loans.use: to buy a solar system and to install it at his house.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 44 años de edad, conviviente tiene una hija dependiente, que vive en casa propia junto a su esposo en El Sector Lishinas, una zona rural del Distrito de Pucara, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público, cuenta con una unidad móvil (mototaxi) con la cual brinda servicio de transporte público desde hace 02 años, cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 700 nuevos soles para la compra de llantas para su vehículo que le permitirá seguir brindando un mejor servicio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar is 44 years old, married, and has one daughter to support. He lives in his own own home with his wife in Lishinas, a rural area of Pucará District, Jaén Province, Cajamarca Region, in the northern mountains of Peru. The people of this area work in agriculture, trade and raising cattle.

Cesar has worked for two years providing taxi services with his one mototaxi. He has very good personal references. He is requesting this loan of 700 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy tires for his mototaxi so that he can continue to offer the best service. He hopes to improve his family's income.

loans.use: to buy tires for his mototaxi.

loans.name: Uguloy

texts.ru: Угулой добрая женщина из отдаленного региона. Она молодая и энергичная. Угулою 19 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Угулой уже более 3 года работает в кафе. Они вместе с родителями открыли этот кафе. Их кафе находится в центре их кишлака. Данный бизнес является источником семейного дохода.  Угулой готовит национальные блюда как плов, самбуса, шашлык и т.д. Угулой работает с раннего утра до позднего вечера. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина. Данное время она планирует увеличить оборотный капитал и с такой целью она обратилась за займом в сумме 7500 сомони для покупки овощей, фруктов и других продуктов питания. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Uguloy is a good woman from a remote region. She is young and energetic. Uguloy is 19 years old. She is not married and lives with her parents. Uguloy has been working in a cafe for more than three years. She and her parents opened this cafe. Their cafe is located in the center of their village. This business is the primary source of family income. Uguloy prepares traditional dishes like pilaf, sambusa, shashlik, etc. Uguloy works from early morning until late evening. She is a very hardworking woman. She plans to increase her working capital and therefore applied for a loan of 7500 TJS to buy vegetables, fruit, and other foods. She is waiting on your kindness.

loans.use: buy vegetables, fruit, and other food items to increase business

loans.name: Marisol Del Carmen

texts.es: Marisol tiene 44 años de edad  y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, su hija de 5 años y su hijo de 15 años de edad. Marisol es muy conocida en su zona como una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora. Ella se dedica a la venta de pan dulce y quesos frescos de forma ambulante. Tiene 9 años de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes. Marisol solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra cemento, arena y grava para repellar las paredes de la vivienda y para encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en: Marisol is 44 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner, her 5-year-old daughter and 15-year-old son. Marisol is well-known in her area as an enterprising and very hard-working woman. She works selling pan dulce and farmer's cheese as a street vendor. She has worked for nine years in this business and, as a result, has many customers. Marisol asks FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, and gravel to plaster the walls of her house and to cement its floor.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, and gravel to plaster the walls of the house and to cement its floor.

loans.name: Bao Beoneere Group

texts.fr:
Mr ZAKARYA est responsable du groupe BAO BEONEERE. Marié, il est père de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 06ans et le moins âgé a 01an 06mois. Personne ne va  à l’école. Il a 03personnes en charge.
Mr est boutiquier  depuis 03ans. Il s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur.
Il veut s’acheter 15 sacs de riz, 06 bidons d’huile de 20 litres.
Mr veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité. Il ambitionne toujours acheter une parcelle et mieux entretenir sa  famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Zakarya is the head of the Bao Beoneere group. He is married with two children ages 18 months and 6 years old. Neither is in school. Mr. Zakarya has three people in his care.

He has been running a shop for three years. He buys his stock at the local market. He would like to buy 15 sacks of rice and six 20-litre cans of oil.

Mr. Zakarya plans to reinvest his profits in his business. His goals remain to buy some land and to better provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy 15 sacks of rice and six 20-litre cans of oil.

loans.name: Daniel Ulises

texts.es:
Daniel, vive felizmente a lado de su esposa y dos hijos de 7 y 3 años de edad respectivamente; por la necesidad de cubrir las necesidades familiares hace ya 4 años cuenta con un taller de estructuras metálicas, oficio que aprendió de su papá, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., lo atiende solo y por el momento no representa riesgos.
 Comprará hierro al por mayor, de diferentes medidas, realizara de la mejor manera su trabajo y podrá trabajar sin escases de material por una larga temporada, espera atraer más clientes para tener mejor rentabilidad y resarcir su deuda lo más pronto posible.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando para ofrecer a su familia una mejor alimentación, vestuario, salud y dar a sus hijos una educación de calidad.
texts.en: Daniel lives happily at the side of his wife and two children, ages 7 and 3.  To meet his family’s needs, he has a metal shop, a trade he learned from his father.  His work schedule is from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. He manages the business alone, and currently this poses no risks. He will purchase iron of different sizes in bulk, and this will enable him perform his work more efficiently and have enough material to work through a long season.  He hopes to have more customers, have better profitability, and repay his debt as soon as possible.His dream is to continue working to provide his family with better nutrition, clothing, and health, as well as give his children a high quality education

loans.use: to purchase iron in bulk.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a Guatemalan artisan who works alongside her husband Jan to craft wooden tableware and accessories. She would like to invest in a bulk purchase of sustainably harvested teakwood. Maria and Jan have been selling through NOVICA since 2011. This is their story:

"We opened our own workshop in 2008 to craft furniture and decorative items that are simple and of good taste. Our designs express the passion that we have for art and for what we do, which is inspired by nature and the beauty of wood. We work with traditional techniques, which includes the materials and style we use for the joinery, the natural finish and the respect for the wood's grain. Together, we craft beautiful pieces from fine, sustainably harvested hardwoods, and we also direct a foundation that helps over 500 children."

"This microcredit will be of great benefit to our business, allowing us to stock up on raw materials and create new product lines. Many thanks for supporting artisans like us!"

Use the link below to view Maria's wooden tableware and accessories on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/8230">http://www.novica.com/kiva/8230

loans.use: to purchase sustainably harvested teakwood in bulk.

loans.name: Faaua

texts.en:
Faaua is a 52-year-old mother of four children. She bakes round pancakes and sells them to the school children and the people of her community. She has been doing this for more than two years now. 

She is planning to use this loan she is applying for to purchase a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, baking powder, cooking oil, pots and pans, and a cooking stove for her business, and to pay school fees for her children. 

Faaua has managed to meet her family's essential everyday needs with the profits she is able to make from her business and she is thinking of coming up with more ways to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, baking powder, cooking oil, pots and pans, and a cooking stove, and to pay school fees.

loans.name: Maletile

texts.en: Maletile is a 29-year-old, married woman with five children. She has a plantation business, which has been in operation for a year, and she sells her produce to the members of her community and to the traveling public. She needs financial assistance in order to expand her plantation business, and that is why she has just joined the SPBD program. She plans to use this money to purchase chemicals, a mist blower, bush knives, blade sharpeners, spades, and shovels. Maletile hopes to save her profits, so she could assist in their family's financial obligations, and also provide better education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals, a mist blower, bush knives, blade sharpeners, spades, and shovels.

loans.name: Anorkhon

texts.ru: Ее зовут Анорхол. Ей 67 лет. Она уроженка района Пяндж. Анорхол не замужем. У нее есть сын и невестка. Сын находится на заработках, а ее невестка живет вместе с ней. Анорхол в течение 25 лет работает в сфере торговли. Анорхол имеет не большое место для продажи. Она занимается продажей разных товаров, в том числе оделяла, сувениры, картины сувениры и много другие товары запечатленных на фотографии. У Анорхол большой опыт работы и она надеется на увеличение ассортимента товара. Но так как у нее не хватает средств для привозки нового товара, она просит кредит. Поддержите Анорхол.
texts.en: Anorkhon is 67 years old. She was born in the Pyandj Region. Anorkhon is not married. She has a son and a daughter-in-law. Her son is currently away as a migrant worker, and her daughter-in-law lives together with her. For 25 years, Anorkhol has worked in retail. She has a small sales stands. She sells miscellaneous items, such as blankets, souvenirs, posters and many other items seen in the photo. Anorkhon has extensive work experience and she would like to expand her stock. Since she lacks the means to deliver new merchandise, she is applying for a loan. Please support Anorkhon!

loans.use: to expand her stock of miscellaneous goods.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
Eva tiene 36 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su hijo en el Distrito de Huarmaca, una comunidad que cuenta con los servicio básicos de agua y luz, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida, bebidas gaseosa, productos de bazar, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en su domicilio, cuenta con clientela considerable, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de productos para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Eva is 36 years old and lives with her son in her own home made of rustic materials in Huarmaca District, Jaén Province, Cajamarca Region, in the northern highlands of Peru. Her community has basic services such as water and electricity, and its inhabitants work in agriculture, trade and raising cattle.

Eva works selling food, carbonated soft drinks and miscellaneous items. Her business is located in her home, and she has a substantial number of customers. She is requesting this loan of 1,000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy larger quantities of products to stock her business. She hopes to improve her income for her family.

loans.use: to buy larger quantifies of food, carbonated soft drinks and miscellaneous products to stock her business.

loans.name: Falanika

texts.en: Falanika is a 34-year-old married woman with six children. She bakes and sells pancakes to the members of her community and has been doing this for almost three years now. She plans to use this loan to purchase cooking oil, sacks of flour, sugar, baking powder, plastic bags, tongs, large pots and pans, a frying pan, and a gas stove for the betterment of her pancake business. She is earning a good profit from her business and has managed to help out financially so that her family does not have to depend only on her husband's salary to carry them through the week.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, sugar, baking powder, plastic bags, sacks of flour, tongs, large pots and pans, a frying pan, and a gas stove.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба с открытой душой и добрым сердцем. Она живет и работает в Таджикистане. Насиба разведена и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Она единственная кормилица своих детей. Насиба начала свой бизнес 2 года назад шитьем одежды. До этого она работала медсестрой в больнице, так как она имеет медицинское образование. Она получала маленькую зарплату, и ее зарплата не хватало для обеспечения семьи. Поэтому она начала бизнес шитьем одежды. Насиба запрашивает займ на сумму 3500 сомони для покупки тканей для шитья и продажи школьной формы. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nasiba has a guileless soul and a good heart. She lives and works in Tajikistan. Nasiba is divorced and is raising two children. She is the only source of support for her children. Two years ago, Nasiba started her business sewing clothes. Before that, since she has a medical education she worked as a nurse in a hospital. She earned a small salary, not enough to support the family. Therefore, she began her business sewing clothes. Nasiba is requesting a loan of 3500 somoni to buy fabric to sew and sell uniforms. She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: buy fabric to sew school uniforms

loans.name: Shaaibu

texts.en:
Shaaibu is a 30-year-old farmer from Ang/Gabas. As a Babban Gona member, Shaaibu, is excited about the opportunity to finally have access to credit, good markets and a trained agronomist. Like all Babban Gona members, Shaaibu can earn up to $2,000/ha this season from growing maize -- more than three times the average Nigerian farmer’s annual income. 

The average Babban Gona farmer yields 30 bags/hectare, double the national average of 14. Shaaibu is ambitious and is aiming to reap 30 bags per hectare this season. When asked, Shaaibu said, “I plan to use the money I make to expand my farmland,” and in five years, I want to “become the most profitable farmer in my community.”

With this loan, he is well on his way to achieving this dream.

loans.use: To access high-quality inputs such as fertilizer and seed in order to double his yield and income.

loans.name: Abdulazeez

texts.en:
Abdulazeez is a 40-year-old farmer from Gwanki. As a Babban Gona member, Abdulazeez, is excited about the opportunity to finally have access to credit, good markets and a trained agronomist. Like all Babban Gona members, Abdulazeez can earn up to $2000/ha this season from growing maize -- more than three times the average Nigerian farmer’s annual income. 

The average Babban Gona farmer yields 30 bags/hectare, double the national average of 14. Abdulazeez is ambitious and is aiming to reap 40 bags per hectare this season. 

When asked, Abdulazeez said, “I plan to use the money I make to educate my children, Mahammadu, Kadija, and Zainab, and ultimately, I want to make more money for myself and my family.” 

With this loan, he is well on his way to achieving this dream.
