texts.en:
Robert, a father of two, lives in Pana-on, Misamis Occidental with his family. He sustains their living with his income from farming, his main source of income. He has been in this field for more than two years. 

To improve the farm, he borrowed a new loan from Gata Daku Multi-purpose Cooperative and intends to buy fertilizer. 

In the future, Robert wants to cultivate the vacant lot for expansion of his farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Lourdes works hard to support her family.

She has a lamination business in the Philippines and earns additional income from a general store. Lourdes is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy new supplies for her lamination business.

Lourdes has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy new supplies for her lamination business.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is 31 years old and married with four children, three in school. Michelle works very hard to provide for her family.

Michelle runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell.

Michelle has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as soap, sugar and other groceries. 

In the future, Michelle would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La Sra. Eva tiene un taller de costura, esta actividad lo realiza con su madre y hermana, gracias a su trabajo puede estudiar la carrera de Enfermería que cursa el 2 año.
Es una persona muy responsable y dedicada a sus estudios y a su familia, aspira a ser una buena profesional y seguir estudiando y servir a las personas.
Eva solicita este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa forma seguir luchando por llegar a sus metas.
texts.en:
Sra. Eva has a sewing workshop. She carries out this activity with her mother and sister, and thanks to this work she is able to study Nursing, of which she completed the second year. 

She is a very responsible person and dedicated to her studies and to her family. She aspires to be a good professional and to continue studying and serving people. 

Eva is requesting this loan to be able to pay her university fees, and this way to be able to continue fighting to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela helps her husband with their fishing business to earn a living. For many years in the fishing business, the couple has sustained their needs and the business is doing well. She has successfully repaid her previous loan used for buying fishing materials. 

Recently, she took out a new loan to buy additional fishing nets and hooks.

She is indeed hoping to have a better living with her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing nets and hooks.

loans.name: Harry

texts.en:
Harry is a married man. He has three children. He describes himself to be an achiever. 

He operates a small restaurant where he cooks food for sale. He describes his family's challenge to be lack of enough water at home. 

He will use the 10,000 KES loan to buy iron sheets and gutters. This will enable him to roof his house and to be able to harvest rain water for domestic use. 

Harry hopes that in the future, he will be prosperous. This is his sixth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy iron sheets and gutters

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy is a female Kiva borrower. She describes herself as being focused. 

Judy operates a retail business where she sells groceries. She describes her family challenge to be insufficient water storage facilities. 

She will use the KES 7,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store water for domestic use. 

This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was successfully repaid.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary, who describes herself as determined, operates a retail business where she sells groceries. She says her biggest family challenge is inadequate water storage capacity, and so she will use this Kes 7,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use. 

This is Mary's third loan with SMEP Micro finance, and previous loans were fully repaid. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to sustain her family.

loans.use: buy a water storage facility

loans.name: Serenthio

texts.en: Serenthio is 32 years old and a repeat client. He is married with one child who is one and a half years old. He has applied for a loan of UGX1,500,000 to buy goats that he will sell to boost his business. He is a hard-working man who works eight hours a day and six days a week. He started his goat trading business in 2010 to be financially stable and meet his family needs. He runs his business from a rural area in Kahungye. His clients are mainly butchers and sometimes people that buy for rearing. He is faced with the challenge of competition and hopes to compete favourably with other business people when he receives the loan money. He hopes that his dreams will come to pass in the near future. Thank you Kiva lenders for the great job.

loans.use: to buy goats.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself to be prayerful. 

She operates a farm where she grows crops. She describes her challenge to be that rainwater goes to waste. 

She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy gutters and other equipment to enable her harvest rain water for domestic use. 

This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy gutters and other equipment to enable her to harvest rain water

loans.name: Paskalia

texts.en:
Paskalia is a married woman. She has 12 children. She describes herself to be business-oriented. 

She operates a farm where she grows cabbages. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in a rural area, and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be fluctuation of prices. 

She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy pesticides. Her business goal is to expand within five years. 

Paskalia hopes that in the future, she will expand to a large scale. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy pesticides

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El señor Mario tiene 48 años, es casado y tiene dos hijos, trabaja por su cuenta, tiene casa propia, vive en la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso.
Se inició como mozo de restaurante, luego puso su local propio, trabaja como parrillero por contrato, que hasta hoy le va muy bien, con clientela ya bien formada por su antigüedad en el rubro.
Solicita el préstamo para poder invertirlo en insumos para su restaurante, como carnes y carbón, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Mario is 48 years old and has two children.  He works on his own, has his own home and lives in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso.

He began working in a restaurant and then set up his own location.  He works as a hired grill master and things are going well for him.  He has steady customers because of the length of time of his trade.

He is asking for this loan so he can buy supplies for his restaurant such as meats and charcoal, and in this way be able to continue working as he has done.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Nilsa

texts.es:
Nilsa es una persona muy luchadora y sacrificada que esta esforzándose por ser una kinesiologa y fisioterapeuta que pueda ayudar a las demás personas por medio de esas profesiones. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda, y por que esta muy agradecida.
Pide este préstamo para poder nuevamente cubrir sus cuotas y también pagar sus gastos de titulación, agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe, que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Nilsa is a real fighter and a self-sacrificing person who is working hard to be a kinesiologist and physiotherapist who can help other people through those professions. 

She says that she used her previous loan to be able to pay her fees, which was very helpful to her and for which she is very grateful. 

She requests this loan to again be able to cover her fees and also to pay for her graduation expenses. She appreciates this new opportunity that she is getting, which will be very helpful to her.

loans.use: to pay for university and graduation expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flagstones and cement to renovate the house from the inside.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven, proviene de una familia humilde pero con deseos de superarse y salir adelante para asi poder ayudadar a su familia.
Está estudiando la carrera de análisis de sistemas, y comenta que su meta es convertirse en un profesional capacitado y ejercer su profesion.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere poder cubrir sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo, y por lo cual está muy agradecido.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young man. He comes from a humble family but wishes to better himself and get ahead in order to be able to help his family.

He is studying the systems analysis career track, and he says that his goal is to become a trained professional and practice his profession. 

He requests this loan because he wants to be able to cover his fees and in that way be able to continue with his studies as he has been doing and for which he is very grateful.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Alice

texts.es:
Alice es estudiante de la carrera de Contaduría Pública, cursado el tercer año de la carrera. Su meta terminar sus estudios y destacarse en la profesión.
 Vive con mis padres, quienes lo inspiran, porque siempre luchan por darle lo mejor y desea retribuirles con un título universitario.
Pide este préstamo para poder sus cubrir sus gastos de manutención, como ser gastos de pasajes de colectivo, comida y demás del día a día de su universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en: Alice is a public accounting student enrolled in her third year of her program. Her goal is to finish her studies and get ahead in the profession. She lives with her parents who inspire her because they strive to give her the best. She hopes to repay them with a university degree. She requested this loan to be able to cover her living expenses such as bus transportation costs, food, and other day to day university expenses so she can continue her studies.

loans.use: to cover living expenses such as transportation costs and food everyday.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is a married man. He has four children. He describes himself as being determined. 

He operates a farm where he grows crops. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a good area. He describes his biggest business challenge to be weather changes. 

Simon will use the KES 6,100 loan to buy a water storage facility, to store clean water for domestic use. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loan was successfully repaid.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel es padre de familia de 47 años que después de muchos años retoma sus estudios para lograr ser un profesional util a mi familia y la sociedad.
Está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, y le gustaría llegar a ser un buen profesional y ejemplo para otras personas de su edad, y poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus gastos de titulación, ya que de esa forma podrá cubrir ese gasto que tiene, y que le será muy útil. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 47 year old father, who after many years returned to his studies in order to accomplish being a professional, useful to his family and to society. He is studying an accounting degree and he would like to become a good professional and an example for other people of his age, and to be able to help his loved ones by way of his studies. 

He is requesting this loan in order to be able to invest it to pay his costs of his degree, since that way he will be able to cover the costs that he has and it will be very useful to him. He is grateful for this opportunity he is receving that will be very helpful to him.

loans.use: to pay costs of his degree.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Mujeres Luchadoras, donde todas y cada una están luchando por sus familias y por sus seres queridos. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, lo cual les ayudara a conocer la situación en la que cada una se encuentra, donde la señora Liz se encuentra en nivel medio de ingresos.
Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a la venta de prendas varias, que lo hace en forma ambulante, es a través de este trabajo que ayuda a su familia y tiene los medios para poder cubrir los gastos del día a día. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora. 
Pide este préstamo, ya que a través de el podrá comprar prendas de invierno, ya que se acerca el frío y quiere poder surtirse para poder ofrecer a sus clientes una buena variedad. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Luchadores” [Striving Women] is a group where each one is striving for their family and their loved ones.  They are using the poverty elimination survey, which allows the women to become familiar with the financial situation of each member of the group. 

Liz has an average income.  Among the work that she does is selling various types of clothing as a street vendor.  It is through this work that she helps her family and has the means to cover the day-to-day expenses.  She is a very hardworking woman and she is a go-getter.

Through this loan that she is requesting, she will be able to purchase winter clothing.  The cold weather is approaching and she wants to be able to stock up and offer her customers a good variety.  She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving and it will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to purchase various winter clothing for sale.

loans.name: Eliud

texts.en: Eliud is a male Kiva borrower who describes himself as experienced. He operates a retail business where he sells paraffin. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. He will use the KES20,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use. He hopes that in the future he will be successful. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance. Eliud repaid his previous loan successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Apple Group

texts.en:
Suzan is the mother of two grown sons and is married. She was born in the 1960s. For ten years now, Suzan has supported her family by running a mamalishe business where she serves breakfast (soup and tea with types of snacks) and lunch (rice, ugali and banana with meat, beans, vegetables. etc.). Suzan shares her business center with her friend, so she runs her business from 5 am to 5 pm daily and after that she hands it over to another person who also serves food up to midnight. She is able to earn a good profit each month.

This will be her eighth loan from Kiva partner, Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans, all of which were paid back successfully, to replenish her stock of food cooking items (rice, cooking oil and maize and baking flour). Suzan replaced her old business cooking pots, serving utensils, tables and chairs with new ones. She is so much happier with Kiva's loan support. She dreams of meeting her vision of managing a successful food business. With the profit she earned, she covered part of school fees and household expenses. Suzan will use this loan to buy rice, maize flour, baking flour, cooking oil, meat for making soup, etc.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Apple" which consists of two members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy rice, maize flour, baking flour, cooking oil, meat for making soup, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es:
Rosa es una joven madre cabeza de hogar, responsable y amorosa con su pequeña hija de 3 años.
Es una mujer emprendedora y con grandes sueños. Inicio con su negocio de venta de mercancía tales como productos para el cuidado personal, ropa y algunos accesorios.
Sus principales clientes son sus amigos más cercanos y familiares a los cuales no pierde la oportunidad de ofrecerles sus productos cada vez que estos la visitan en su casa de ofrecerles sus productos cada vez que estos la visitan en su casa.
Su objetivo para este año es ampliar su gama de clientes y empezar a vender a mayor escala, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de ropa y cremas para la piel.
Confía en la buena voluntad de las personas para salir adelante con su proyecto.
texts.en:
Rosa is a young mother and head of household. She is responsible and loving with her young three year old daughter. 

She is an entrepreneurial woman with big dreams. She began her business of selling merchandise such as personal hygiene products, clothing and some accessories. 

Her main customers are her closest friends and family, and she does not miss the chance to offer them her products each time that they visit her at home. 

Her goal for this year is to amplify her range of customers and to begin to sell at a greater scale. For this reason she is requesting a loan for the purchase of an assortment of clothing and skin creams. 

She trusts in the goodwill of people in order to come out ahead with her project.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothing and skin creams.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa vive con sus esposo y con sus 3 hijos de los cuales 2  estan estudiando y el mayor que tiene 18 años quiere ingresar a la universidad pero no puede hacerlo por falta de recursos ecunomicos, Rosa se dedica a la agricultura desde que era una adolecente al igual que su esposo, el credito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono y fungicidas para tener sanos sus cultivos de los que aspira lograr una buena cosecha para enviar a su hijo a la universidad.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her husband and their three children. Two children go to school while the eldest, 18, wants to go to the university but cannot due to limited economic resources. 

Like her husband, Rosa has worked in agriculture since she was an adolescent. The loan will be invested to purchase fertilizers and fungicides to have healthy crops that will reap a good harvest in order to send her son to the university.

loans.use: to buy fungicides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Paulo Roberto

texts.es: Roberto es un joven emprendedor, el tiene 22 años y es un año que tiene su negocio que es deposito de huevos y un frigorifico en un local por el que paga arriendo, comenta que le va bien en este negocio ya que da buen trato a sus lientes, Roberto vive con su madre, el credito lo va a invertir en la compra de   mercaderia en huevos y embutidos para ampliar su negocio, de aste negocio aspira sacar provecho para cubrir los gastos que implica ingresar a la universidad.
texts.en:
Roberto is a young entrepreneur. He is 22 years old and for one year has had his business, which is a supply of eggs and a refrigerator for which he pays rent in a local store. He says that he is doing well in this business because he treats his clients well.

Roberto lives with his mother. He is going to invest the loan in the purchase of egg and cold cuts merchandise in order to expand his business. He aspires to cover the expenses involved in entering the university with what he makes at this business.

loans.use: to purchase egg and cold cuts merchandise.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is a female Kiva borrower. She describes herself as obedient and determined. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the off peak season, which has fewer customers. She will use the KES 75,000 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water for domestic use. She hopes that in the future, she will educate her children. This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance. Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana tiene 21 años y está cursando la carrea de enfermería, está en su tercer año y su sueño es terminar la carrera para poder ejercerlo fuera del país específicamente en Italia.
Aparte del logro personal es también ayudarles a sus padres por todo el sacrificio que hicieron por ella, es por ello que se está sacrificando.
Pide este préstamo para pagar sus cuotas y así seguir con sus estudios, luchando por alcanzar su meta.
texts.en:
Ana is 21 years old and is studying to become a nurse.  This is her third year and her dream is to complete her education so she can work outside the country, especially in Italy.

She also has a personal goal of helping out her parents for all the sacrifice that they did for her.  This is why she is making sacrifices now.

She is asking for this loan to pay her tuition and continue her education, striving to reach her goal.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to hire labourers to improve his home

loans.name: Tony

texts.en:
Tony owns and manages his farm to make a living. He has had his farm for over eleven years. He successfully repaid the previous loan he used for his farm. Tony always finds ways to harvest more than he has before. 

Recently, he took a new loan to purchase organic fertilizer. He wants to improve his farm to create a better source of income for his family in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en: Nelly is a female Kiva borrower. She describes herself as experienced. She operates a retail business where she offers M-pesa services. She describes her family challenge to be accessing clean water. She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use. This will benefit five family members. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful. This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make cold water and ice to sell

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Мунира фермер из района Пяндж. Она замужем за плотника и у них двое детей. Мунира вместе со свекровью и свёкром занимается растениеводством. Мунира любит работать на грядке и собирать плоды своих трудов. Она занимается этой деятельностью уже 3 года. Мунира по натуре трудолюбивая и общительная женщина. Сейчас она готовится к очередным посевам. Для этого она берет кредит, чтобы купить семена и минеральные удобрения. Мунира в будущем хочет расширить земельный участок и увеличить посевы.
texts.en: Munira is a farmer from the Pyandj district. She is married to a carpenter and they have two children. Munira, her mother-in-law, and her father-in-law grow crops. She loves to work in the fields and gather the fruits of their labor. She has been a farmer for three years and is a hardworking and sociable woman by nature. She is currently preparing for the next planting season and needs to take out a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. In the future Munira wants to expand their fields and plant more crops.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her crops

loans.name: Angelica

texts.en:
Angelica is a female Kiva borrower. She has two children. She describes herself as determined. 

Angelica operates a beauty salon where she offers salon services. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are ladies. 

She will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use, and to buy salon products. Her business goal is to own a large salon within five years. This is her third loan with SMEP Micro-finance. She repaid her previous loan successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use, and to buy salon products.

loans.name: Uzima Group

texts.fr:
Hidaya fait partie du groupe  Uzima  et  habite à Bujumbura. Elle a 37 ans et est mariée à Jumatatu  un cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants âgés de 9 à 20 ans.

Elle fait le commerce du riz padhi  depuis  20 ans. 

Elle  est son sixième crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité du riz padhi  à revendre, pour gagner plus.

Dans les années à prochaine, elle voudrait  importer des pagnes et des chaussures pour femmes et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Hidaya is part of the Uzima group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 37 years old and is married to Jumatutu, a farmer. Together they have four children whose ages range from 9 to 20 years. 

She has been trading padhi rice for the past 20 years. This is her sixth loan with Turame. With the KIVA loan, she will increase her working capital and buy a large quantity of padhi rice for resale, to earn more. 

In following years, she would like to import pagnes (colorful West-African fabric) and shoes for women, and see her children pursue their studies.

loans.use: increase her working capital and buy a large quantity of padhi rice for resale, to earn more.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn is a hard-working mother who helps her husband support their family. She is 50 years old and has three children. She engages in the buying and selling of fish and frozen foods within her community. She aspires to make her business more profitable in order to earn a higher income and sustain the necessities of her family. She plans to acquire more stock to sell but she has inadequate capital. For this reason, Marilyn is requesting a loan of PHP20,000 to buy more stock of fish and frozen foods to resell. Being a kind and hard-working mother, she believes that someday she will make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fish and frozen foods to resell.

location.town: Brgy. Bintawan Norte, Villaverde, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and supplies to consolidate herself as the main shopkeeper in her sector

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shelving, glass and general supplies.

loans.name: Sa'ad

texts.en:
Sa'ad is a 47-year-old married man with four children. His oldest child is 25 years old and the youngest one is 19 years old. Sa'ad lives with his family in Sana'a, Yemen. He studied until the secondary education. Due to getting married when he was very young, he couldn't complete his studies. Recently, Sa'ad is an employee in the public sector with a small salary. His salary is not enough to cover all the expenses of his family. Therefore, he decided to buy a rickshaw in order to help him improve the living standards of his family. As a result, Sa'ad applied for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a rickshaw.

Sa'ad hopes to purchase a taxi in addition to the rickshaw in order to provide his family with a better future.

loans.use: to purchase a rickshaw

loans.name: Zoila Beatriz

texts.es: A sus 68 años de edad Ziola  es soltera, vive con su  hija y con sus 3 nietos a los que los cuida y los ayuda economicamente y es Zoila practicamente quien cria a sus nietos, mientras que la madre de los niños se va atrabajar, zoila se dedica al comercio de quesos, comenta que los compra y que despues les vende para obtener alguna ganancia, el credito lo va a invertir en la compra de quesos, Zoila aspira que le vaya mucho mejor en su negocio para seguir apoyando a sus nietos.
texts.en: Ziola, 68, is single and lives with her daughter and three grandchildren whom she looks after and supports financially. Zoila is in practice raising her grandchildren, while the mother of the children goes to work. Zoila works in the cheese trade. She buys cheeses and then sells them for a profit. She will invest the loan in the purchase of cheese. Zoila hopes her business will improve so she can continue to support her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy cheese.

loans.name: Claudia Jacqueline

texts.es: Claudia tiene 25 años de edad y junto a su esposo ha procreado dos hijas de 6 y 3 años de edad quienes a la fecha se encuentran estudiando. Claudia posee una pequeña tiene una pequeña tienda en su lugar de habitación desde hace tres años. Este negocio es el que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y de esta forma junto a su esposo mantienen la economía de su familia. Claudia solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea reparar un cuarto para el cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en: Claudia is 25 years old, and with her husband she has two daughters, who are 6 and 3 years old and who are students at the moment. Claudia has owned a small store in her home for three years. This business brings the income to her household, and in this way, together with her husband they support the family's finances. Claudia is requesting a loan to FUSAI because she wishes to repair a room. For this she needs materials such as: brick, cement, sand and iron.

loans.use: To buy brick, cement, sand and iron in order to repair a room.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita es madre de familia, es por ellos que se está esforzando para poder ayudarles por medio de la carrera que está estudiando.
Uno de sus objetivos es obtener su titulo como profesional y poder ejercer para una mejor estabilidad económica. Comenta que se casó muy joven por lo que no le fue posible estudiar antes.
Hoy pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, ya que de esa forma podrá estar cerca de cumplir con su meta. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda
texts.en:
Margarita is a mother, so she strives to help her family by studying for a degree. One of her goals is to become a degreed professional so that she can achieve better financial stability. She says that she got married at a young age, so it was not possible for her to study before.

Today she is requesting this loan so that she can invest in her degree expenses. Margarita is near the completion of her goal. She is grateful for the opportunity she has received since it will be of much help.

loans.use: to pay her degree expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Repair his car to provide better transportation

loans.name: Salah

texts.en:
Salah is a married man. He has three children. He describes himself to be responsible. He operates a retail business where he sells charcoal. He has been involved in this business for 15 years. His business is located in an area with potential. He describes his biggest business challenge to be seasonal variation. 

He will use the KES 75,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use. 

His business goal is to have a stable business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will own a large store. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a married man. He has one child. He describes himself to be responsible. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his tuk tuk (a motorcycle-based taxi). He has been involved in this business for four years. 

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use. 

His business goal is to own a tour firm within five years. This is his sixth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use.

loans.name: Rubi Selenia

texts.es:
Rubi es una joven emprendedora, tiene 20 años de edad y vive en Pisco junto a su pareja.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desde hace 1 año trabaja en una empresa de la Lotería y le va muy bien porque es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable, y muy dedicada a su labor.
Rubi está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá realizar un mejoramiento a su casa como pintarrajear las paredes y arreglar el piso, de esta manera estará mejorando su nivel de vida y podrá vivir de manera cómoda junto a su familia. Con esto ella podrá cumplir su más grande sueño: "Tener su vivienda terminada".
texts.en:
Rubi is an enterprising woman, 20 years old, and lives in Pisco with her partner.  She is a person with a great desire to get ahead; for the past year she has worked for a lottery company.  This is going well for her because she is a very hard-working person, responsible, and dedicated to her work.

Rubi is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the help they have provided she can make improvements in her house such as painting the walls and fixing the floor, thus improving her standard of living and being able to live comfortably with her family.  She will be able to fulfill her greatest dream: "to have her home completely finished".

loans.use: to improve her home (paint the walls and fix the floor)

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 60 years old and married with seven children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Erlinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Erlinda has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, spices, beverages and other groceries. 

In the future, Erlinda would like to save enough to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Fely

texts.en:
Fely is 65 years old and married.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell.

Fely has borrowed and repaid ten loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Fely aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Evans

texts.en:
Evans is a male Kiva borrower. He describes himself as experienced. He operates a retail business where he offers computer services like printing, type-setting, photocopying, etc. 

He describes his family challenge to be accessing clean water. He will use the Kes 70,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use. He hopes that, in the future, he will be successful. This is his seventh loan with SMEP Micro-finance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay accreditation fees for her accounting degree.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline is a female Kiva borrower. She describes herself as experienced and industrious. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She describes her challenge to be accessing clean water. Caroline will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use. She hopes that, in the future, she will be successful. This is her third loan from SMEP Micro-finance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 50 years old, and married with four children. 

Susana is in the agricultural business, raising cattle in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her cattle.

Susana has been raising cattle for 21 years, and has borrowed 17 times from NWTF in the past to sustain her business.

In the future, Susana would like to save enough to create more financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her cattle.

loans.name: Yessir Jose

texts.es:
Yessir un humilde joven de 26 años de edad, padre de dos hijos cuyo barrio es considerado el más pobre de toda la ciudad puesto que no cuenta si quiera con agua potable o algunos servicios públicos como gas, electricidad por no decir mas. 
Se desempeña como reparador de neveras, actividad que aprendió empíricamente viendo y ofreciéndose como ayudante en talleres, Yessir sueña con poder consolidar su negocio y es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de neveras en mal estado las cuales reparar, pintara y posteriormente venderá buscando siempre conseguir recursos para mudarse de barrio ya que no quiere que sus hijos crezcan en este ambiente rodeados de malos ejemplos que se ven en cada esquina y es por ellos que luchara incansablemente dado que no quiere que vivan la vida tan difícil que a él le toco.
texts.en:
Yessir is a humble man, 26 years old, and the father of two children.  His neighborhood is considered the poorest in the whole city since it doesn't even have potable water or public services such as gas and electricity, to say no more.

He works at repairing refrigerators, which he learned to do in practice, watching and offering his assistance in workshops.  Yessir dreams of building his business, and to do this is asking for a loan to invest in buying refrigerators in bad shape which he will repair, paint,and then sell, always trying to obtain resources so that he can move from that neighborhood.  This is because Yessir does not want his children to grow up in an atmosphere full of bad examples on every street corner, and it is for his children that he will fight without tiring.  He does not want them to have a life as difficult as the one that has been his lot.

loans.use: to buy refrigerators in bad shape in order to repair, paint, and  sell them

loans.name: Yohemis

texts.es:
Yohemis, a pesar de no haber recibido una educación superior, tiene la plena certeza de que para salir adelante lo único que necesita es tener voluntad y tomar buenas decisiones.
Ella tiene un vivero el cual asiste todos los días para cultivar unas flores y plantas de buena calidad.
Estas plantas las venden en el mercado local y con esta actividad es que ha sostenido a su familia por más de 18 años, siempre con buena disposición y perseverancia.
Pide un auxilio económico para la compra de insumos para el cuidado de sus tierras como abono y pesticidas.
Este préstamo le permitirá tener unos cultivos más productivos y mejorar sus ingresos de una manera significativa, teniendo como privilegio el mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de su familia.
Su principal desafío es el clima que en muchas ocasiones hace que su trabajo se ponga difícil.
texts.en:
Yohemis, despite not having recieved a higher education, is fully certain that in order to come out ahead the only thing she needs is to have goodwill and make good decisions. 

She has a nusery which she helps everyday in order to cultivate flowers and plants of good quality. She sells these plants in the local maket and it is with this activity that she has supported her family for more than 18 years, always with a good disposition and perseverence. She is asking for economic assistance for the purchase of supplies for the care of her land such as fertilizers and pesticides. 

This loan will allow her to have more productive crops and improve her income in a significant manner, having as a privilege the improvement of her family's quality of life. Her greatest challenge is the climate, which on many occassions makes her work become difficult.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase medicine.

loans.name: Mohrajab

texts.ru: Мохрачаб 50 лет. Она живет на районе Пяндж. Махрачаб замужняя женщина и воспитывает двоих детей. Муж Мохрачаб находиться в Российской Федерации на заработках.  Дети занимаются земледелием, как и она. Мохрачаб тоже занимается земледелием. В этой сфере деятельности она занимается довольно долгое время. Она научилась правильно посеять урожай еще в юном возрасте. Но кроме этого Мохрачаб 13 лет преподает в школе. Мохрачабу прекрасно удается совмещать две совершенно не похожие деятельности. Она любит работать на земле и надеется в этом году с помощью минеральных удобрений получить хороший урожай. Мохрачабу не хватает немного денег, чтобы купить минеральных удобрений и семена. Мохрачаб намерена заемные деньги использовать целенаправленно, и купить семена и минеральные удобрения.
texts.en: Mohrajab is 50 and lives in the Pyandj district. She is married and has two children. Her husband is working in Russia and she and her children are farmers. She learned how to properly plant crops at an early age and has been working in this area for quite a long time. She has also been a teacher for 13 years and manages to successfully combine these two different professions. She loves to work the land and hopes to receive a good harvest this year with the help of fertilizers. Mohrajab does not have enough money for fertilizers and seeds and will use the loan to buy them.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter, a married father of four, describes himself to be determined. He operates a business transporting customers and goods with his van, an enterprise he has had for 15 years. Peter describes his biggest challenge to be a shortage of finances. His business goal is to own a large transport company within five years.

Peter will use this Kes 75,000 loan to buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use.  This is his seventh loan with SMEP Micro finance Bank. Previous loans were all repaid.

loans.use: buy a water storage facility to store clean water for domestic use

loans.name: Zemstaaba Group

texts.fr:
Mme BERNADETTE représente le groupe  ZEMSTAABA. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgée a 21ans et le moins âgé a 07ans. Tous vont à l’école.
Mme est gérante d’une boutique depuis 09ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans une grande boutique en ville. 
Mme veut s’acheter 02bidons  d’huile, 03cartons de savon et 01sac de riz pour revendre.
Elle épargne ses bénéfices pour renforcer son activité. Mme ambitionne agrandir son chiffre d’affaire et soutenir son mari dans les charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Bernadette represents the Zemstaaba group. She is doing well. She is married and has 2 children. The oldest is 21 years old and the youngest is 7. Both of them are in school.

Bernadette has been a shop owner for 9 years. She gets her supplies at a large store in town. She hopes to buy 2 cans of oil, 3 boxes of soap and 1 bag of rice to sell. She saves her income in order to strengthen her business. Her goal is to increase her revenue and help her husband pay for family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 2 cans of oil, 3 boxes of soap and 1 bag of rice for resale.

loans.name: Liney Esther

texts.es:
Liney, a través de todo este tiempo, ha podido adquirir grandes conocimientos en el manejo y producción de animales, especialmente en la cría y cuidado de cerdos de engorde. Es una actividad aprendida de forma empírica y ejercida con todo el empeño que una mujer con coraje puede tener.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos de engorde y de esta manera poder capitalizar su negocio. Al aumentar su cantidad de animales para vender podrá aumentar también sus ingresos y mejorara de una manera efectiva su calidad de vida.
Su mayor desafío es la falta de capital para trabajar y las temporadas en las que los porcinos son muy baratos para la venta.
texts.en:
Liney, through this whole time, has been able to acquire great knowledge in the handling and production of animals, especially in the growth and care of pigs for fattening. It is an activity learned by empirical form and exercised with all of the determination that a woman with courage can have. 

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of pigs for fattening and this way will be able to capitalize her business. Upon augmenting her quantity of animals to sell, she will also be able to augment her income and improve in an effective manner her quality of life. 

Her greatest challenge is the lack of capital to work and the seasons in which pigs are very cheap to sell.

loans.use: to buy pigs for fattening.

loans.name: Marina Elizabeth

texts.es: Marina es una mujer de un carácter muy agradable, ella tienen un hijo de 22 años y una hija de 19 años mismos que se encuentran estudiando en la universidad, Marina juntamente con su esposo se dedican a trabajar en su negocio de elaboracion de quesos, el credito lo va ainvertir en la compra de leche ya que comenta que debe tener doble capital, uno para quedar bien en los pagos a sus provedores de leche y otro capital para dar a credito sus productos a sus clientes, con su gran optimismo Marina espera seguir creciendo con su negocio y darles una buena educacion a sus hijos para que ellos tengan un buen futuro.
texts.en: Marina is a woman with a very agreeable character. She has a 22 year old son and a 19 year old daughter. Both are pursuing studies in university. Marina works together with her husband in their cheese-making business. The loan will go towards purchasing milk. She says that she needs to have double capital; half to remain in good standing with their milk providers, and the other half to give their customers products on credit. With her great optimism, Marina hopes to continue to grow her business and to give a good education to her children so that they can have a good future.

loans.use: to buy cheese

loans.name: Enzo

texts.es:
Enzo actualmente está cursando la carrera de Administración de Empresas, tiene una muy buena base por el hecho de haberse iniciado en un colegio Técnico.
Espera recibirse y ser un buen profesional el día de mañana y ser un líder dentro de la sociedad. Su familia está para ayudarlo siempre y es donde encuentra su fortaleza.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de universidad, lo que le servirá para poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Enzo is currently pursuing a degree in Business Administration. He has a very good base of knowledge since he started out at a technical school.

Enzo hopes to receive his degree and someday become a successful professional and a leader in society. His family is always available to help him and that is where he gets his strength.

Enzo is requesting this loan so that he can pay his university fees, which will allow him to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Ohsin

texts.es: Ohsin es soltera pero tiene un hijo y vive con sus padres en La Paz  en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde pagan un alquiler Ohsin se dedica a la compra y venta de material desechable como botellas, plásticos y fierro. Ella corre el peligro de contraer enfermedades por la contaminación de los materiales con los que trabaja, sobretodo por la falta de higiene al manipular los mismos Ohsin quiere un credito para abrir otro centro de reciclaje de materiales para poder incrementar sus ganancias Por el momento Ohsin es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Ohsin is single but she has one child. She lives with her parents in La Paz in a brick and mortar house which they rent. Ohsin buys and sells disposable materials such as bottles, plastics and metal. She is in danger of contracting illnesses due to contamination from her working materials, in particular due to lack of hygiene when manipulating them. Ohsin is asking for a loan to open another center for recycling materials in order to increase her profit. For the time being, Ohsin is the only source of income in her household so she needs help.

loans.use: to open another recycling center.

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth es una señora muy alegre y trabajadora, ella es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 10, 12 y 16 años que se encuentran estudiando, Elizabeth se dedica a dos actividades, en la mañana vende confites y otros productos en el bar de la escuela donde asiste su hijo y en la tarde se dedica a vender ropa de puerta en puerta y alunos pedidos que le hacen sus clientas, el credito lo va a invertir en la compra de mercaderia en ropa, Elizabeth aspira que mejoren sus ventas y mas adelante le gustaria  ponerse un almacen de ropa pero bien lindo con mucha variedad de ropa y asi sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a very happy and hardworking woman. She is married and has three children, who are 10, 12 and 16 years old and who are in school. 

Elizabeth is committed to two jobs: in the morning she sells sweets and other items at a snack bar in the school one of her children attends and in the afternoon she sells clothing door to door and on order for some of her customers.

Exliabeth will use the loan to purchase clothing merchandise. She aspires to improve her sales and in the future she would like to open a beautiful clothing store with a great variety of clothing so that she can help her children get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase clothing merchandise.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny is 28 years old and married.

Jenny runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell in her store.

Jenny has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, biscuits, bread, and other groceries. 

In the future Jenny would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a 26-year-old married woman with four children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Lolita has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more items like snack foods, beverages, sardines, and other groceries.

Lolita has been in this business for six years. In the future, Lolita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like snack foods, beverages, sardines, and other groceries.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es: Emiliana es una mujer muy trabajadora vive en casa de sus padres en la ciudad de La Paz.  Se dedica principalmente a la elaboracion de calzados de cuero para damas  que son repartidos en la ciudad de La Paz trabaja muy responsablemente en conjunto con sus padres.  Emiliana necesita el credito para la compra de material (cuero,hebillas,goma para los tacos, etc.) Emiliana es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Emiliana is a hardworking woman who lives at her parents’ house in the city of La Paz. She manufactures primarily leather shoes for women, which are delivered throughout the city of La Paz. Emiliana works very responsibly with her parents.

She needs a loan in order to buy materials such as leather, buckles, rubber heels, and other supplies. Emiliana is the only one responsible for the household income, so she is in need of assistance.

loans.use: to buy leather, buckles, rubber heels, and other supplies for making women's shoes.

loans.name: Washingtone

texts.en:
Washingtone is 38 years old, married, and blessed with three children, aged seven, five and three years respectively.  For the last seven years he has been in motorcycle transport where he makes a monthly income of KES. 9,000, which he uses to support his family.

He has applied for his third loan of KES.12,000 which he will use to buy an extra wheel and repair his motorcycle so that he can serve his customers well.  He will use the anticipated income to give basic needs to his family.

He hopes to grow his business and give best education to his children.

loans.use: to buy an extra wheel and repair his motorcycle

loans.name: Maylene

texts.en: As a way of generating income, Maylene has been engaged in selling snack foods within the school campus and at the street during weekends. She is 29 years old, married, and has three children. Due to financial difficulty, she wants to make her business more profitable in order to earn a higher income. She aims to sell more kinds of snack recipes but she has limited capital. For this reason, she wants a loan of PHP5,000 to buy coconut juice, fish balls, banana cue and rice cakes to resell. Through patience and hard work, Maylene believes that she will further improve her business someday.

loans.use: to buy coconut juice, fish balls, banana cue and rice cake to resell

loans.name: Eliza Jane

texts.en:
Eliza Jane wants to be an accountant in the future. She is studying for a BS in Accountancy at Stella Maris College in Oroquieta City. Her previous loan was used for her allowances and to pay for her additional school fees and allowances.

 Eliza Jane wants to finish her studies and become successful, so that she would be able to help her parents in the future.

Recently, she took a loan to pay her tuition fee for the first semester.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fee for the first semester.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean is studying Business Administration in the university. She wants to finish her studies and find a job in the future to help her family. She had her previous loans from GDMPC that covered the payment of her tuition fees and supplies. This current semester, she took a new loan again to cover the costs of the first semester tuition fees.

She wants to be successful in her future and be able to help the family to improve their living.

loans.use: to cover the costs of the first semester tuition fees

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF in order to buy more dried fish to sell to customers. Tessie has successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Tessie's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Al- Wafa Al- Thawra Group

texts.en:
Al- Wafa Al- Thawra is a group that is comprised of five women from Sana'a, Yemen. They are requesting a loan of 250,000 YER from AMB.
	
Shifa is the leader of the group. She is a 23-year-old married woman with three children. She is an uneducated woman and works as a housewife. Her husband is an employee in a public sector. The salary that he receives from his job is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family. Shifa's house lacks a refrigerator and she can't afford this thing. Inside the kitchen of her house, she puts many kinds of drinks, foods, sweets, and vegetables without a refrigerator where they need to be in a cold condition. Particularly, the climate these days is very hot. Unfortunately, she doesn't have a refrigerator in order to keep all those items in a cold condition. As a result, most of those foods and drinks expire quickly. For this reason, Shifa is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a refrigerator for the house.

Shifa looks forward to improving the condition of her family.
.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for the house.

loans.name: Oista

texts.en: Oista was born in 1958. She has a child who is an adult. Oista is a woman with a kind heart and a great desire to get success. She has experienced a lot of difficulties in life. She is widowed and raised her child alone. Oista has been busy with selling oil more than eight years. She sells oil in a local market. She buys oil in a bulk and retails it. Oista is very sociable woman so she has regular customers. Oista is going to increase her working capital and maximize profit. She is asking for a loan of 4000 somoni to buy oil. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy oil for increasing working capital

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela actualmente está cursando el 3er año de la carrera de Derecho, es Funcionaria y comenta que quiere trabajar en la parte de Asesoría Jurídica de la Institución donde está.
Ella es una persona muy emprendedora que esa luchando y se está esforzando por ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, con lo cual podrá solventar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Mariela is currently in the third year of her law degree program. She is a civil servant and says that she wants to work in the legal department of the institution where she is employed.

Mariela is an enterprising individual who is struggling and striving to become someone in life. She is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the payment of her university fees, which will help to cover her studies.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en: Being a responsible mother, Lorna has been engaged in cooking and selling snack foods within the local community. She is 39 years old and has six children. She was separated from her husband due to unavoidable circumstances. Despite this, she has the strong determination to uplift the living status of her family. She aims to improve and strengthen her business but she has limited capital. For this reason, she would like a loan of PHP5,000 to buy flour, sugar, milk, rice cakes, banana cue and coconut juice to cook and sell. Being a kind and industrious mother, Lorna hopes that someday she will make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, milk, rice cakes, banana cue and coconut juice to sell

loans.name: Noeli

texts.en:
Noeli is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Noeli is 28 years old and all of her children are in school.

Noeli has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 19,500 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Noeli has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Al-Amel Nokom Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Amel Nokom. It is comprised of six women from Sana'a, Yemen. They are requesting a group loan of YER 300,000 from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank (AMB).

Jamila is the leader of the group. She is a 34-year-old, married woman, with six children. She lives with her family in their own house. Jamila works as a housewife and she is very dynamic woman. Her husband is an employee in a public sector. The salary that he receives from his work is good, but it is not enough to renovate their old house.  

Their house needs renovation from the inside. Most of the rooms are not renovated, in addition to the kitchen and the bathroom. This reflects negatively on Jamila and she feels ashamed, especially if any guests or visitors come to her house. 

For this reason, she applied for a loan of YER 50,000 from AMB in order to purchase cement to renovate the house from the inside.

Jamila hopes to renovate all of her house and to rent it in order to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to renovate the house from the inside.

loans.name: Katerina

texts.en:
Katerina had two dairy cows, yet unfortunately, they got food poisoning and died.  She now wants to replace them and buy one at the moment, and this is why she needs your help.
Katerina is a married villager and has two children.  They all live in northern Albania. In addition to the cows she previously had, she’s got pigs and chickens and sells piglets and eggs.  When she had the dairy cows, she sold raw milk too, and the money she earned then was much higher than now since she sold milk almost every day. Kindly note that two cows produce roughly 30kg/day and one kilo is sold about 6 cents. 
Corn, wheat, citrus and grapevines are the most planted grains and orchards among the villagers, and cows, sheep, chickens and pigs are the animals that bring the most income to the locals.

loans.use: to replace two dairy cows that died from food poison

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: Irene esta casada, tiene dos hijos, ella vive en La Paz en una casa de acabado fino que es de su propiedad  Irene trabaja como secretaria y necesita un credito para comprar ventanas, puertas y pintar su casa El marido tambien le ayuda pero lo que ambos ganan no alcanza considerando que deben mantener a sus hijos por eso Irene necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Irene is married with two children, and lives in La Paz in a finely-finished house that is her property. Irene works as a secretary and needs a loan to buy windows, doors, and paint for her house. Her husband also helps, but their combined earnings are not enough to care for their children. This is why Irene is requesting help.

loans.use: to buy windows and doors for her house and paint the facade

loans.name: Elva Doris

texts.es:
Elva es una mujer emprendedora, tiene 30 años de edad, es soltera y vive en el Distrito de Chepén junto a su familia.
Desde hace más de 8 años trabaja en un Restaurante en el cargo de atención al cliente, le va muy bien porque es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y sobre todo porque atiende con mucho respeto y amabilidad a los clientes.
Elva está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar un electrodoméstico (refrigeradora) para que de esta manera los alimentos que compre sean más duraderos y pueda ahorrar más dinero, de esta manera mejorará su calidad de vida y seguirá trabajando con mucho empeño y dedicación.
texts.en:
Elva is an enterprising woman. She is 30 years old, is single, and lives in the Chepen District with her family. For over 8 years she has worked in a restaurant in the position of customer service. She is doing very well because she is a very hardworking, responsible person and above all because she treats customers with a lot of respect and kindness. 

Elva is grateful to the Kiva investors because with the support that they have given her, she will be able to buy an appliance (refrigerator) so that this way the food that she buys will keep longer and she can save more money. In this way she will improve her quality of life and continue working with a lot of determination and dedication.

loans.use: to purchase an appliance (refrigerator).

loans.name: Mary Jean

texts.en:
Mary Jean is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Mary Jean is 37 years old and has two children who are in school.  Mary Jean has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 6000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Mary Jean has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 58 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Rosalie is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and farm supplies.

Rosalie has been farming vegetables for 21 years and also earns additional income from vending food.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and farm supplies.

loans.name: Jaime Alberto

texts.es: Jaime un experimentado hombre de 51 años de edad el cual inicio sus oficios como ordeñador en finca y fue ahorrando poco a poco para comenzar a adquirir sus propias vacas hasta tener un buen número de ganado, pero pro malos negocios lo perdió y todo y en vista de que tiene dos hijas menores de edad quiere iniciar de nuevo su negocio desde 0 y es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para la compra de terneras y del primer mes de cuido para ellos, Jaime afirma que lo importante es poderse levantar y comenzar de 0 y que más que tiene en sus hijas la principal motivación para volver a ser ese productor de leche que era en años anteriores o quizás mejor, con el crédito podrá reactivar su empresa puesto que en el momento se dedica a cuidar ganado en fincas.
texts.en:
Jaime is 51 years old and has a lot of experience. He started his career milking the animals on a farm and, little by little, saved up the money to buy his own cows. He continued this until he had a good-sized herd. Due to a bit of bad business, however, Jaime lost everything. Now that he has two young daughters, Jaime wants to start up his business from scratch again. As a result he is applying for a loan in order to buy calves and one month's worth of feed. 

Jaime tells us that it is important to be able to rise up again and start from nothing. More than anything else, Jaime's daughters are his biggest motivation to become a milk producer like he was many years ago, if not better. This loan will be used to re-start Jaime's business; at the moment he works raising cattle on farms.

loans.use: to buy calves and one month's worth of feed in order to re-start his milk producing business.

loans.name: Melahat

texts.en:
Melahat is a widow with two children.  One of her children, who is 35, is very ill.   She is a housewife, however she tries not to think about these issues and would rather spend her time more productively.  

Melahat has started to sell cotton clothing and she feels this work is a good activity to keep her mind off of her troubles, as she likes interacting with customers.

With this loan Melahat will buy more products to sell.  At this moment her work is going well; she is healthy and able to support her daughter and would like to continue with this work.

loans.use: to buy clothing to resell.

loans.name: Javier De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Javier es un incansable hombre de 53 años de edad dedicado toda la vida a su trabajo y familia, criado bajos los valores morales de una humilde familia campesina donde el respeto, la humildad. Y el trabajo son los principales pilares, se dedica al cultivo de cebolla, maíz. Frijol, café y es tanto el deseo por trabajar de Javier que en semana trabajo en dos fincas para no estarse quieto en ningún momento. 
Es padre de tres hijos y tiene un orgulloso matrimonio y  ante su deseo de sentirse aún más productivo quiere comenzar con la venta de cerdos. 
Es ayudado por su hijo y como quiere progresar y cada día demostrarse que la edad solo lo hace ser más experimentado solicita un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, compra de fumigadora y lechonas con lo que le generara otra entrada para su hogar brindándole pues quiere morir trabajando en su productiva finca
texts.en:
Javier is a tireless man of 53 who dedicates his entire life to his work and family. He was raised according to the moral values of a humble country family, where respect, humility and work were the main pillars. He works growing onions, corn, beans, and coffee, and has such a desire to work that during the week he works on two plantations, so as not to be idle for even a moment.

He is the father of three children and has a marriage to be proud of, and in light of his desire to feel even more productive, he wants to begin selling pigs. He is aided by his son, and as he wants to make progress, and to show him every day that age only makes one more experienced, he is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, compost, seeds, a spraying machine and suckling pigs, with which he will generate another income to offer his household. He wants to die working on his productive land.

loans.use: to buy a spraying machine, pigs, fertilizers, compost, and seeds for his land since he wants to work until the end of his life.

loans.name: Thach's Group

texts.en:
Thach is 63 years old living with her husband and seven daughters in a rural village of the Sangke district of Battambang province. 

Rice farming is the main source for her family’s income and she has been farming for about 11 years. Her current business earns about 60,000KHR daily, and she is able to save 40,000KHR each day. 

This is the eighth loan for Thach with VisionFund.  She paid back the past loan with VisionFund and is now leading her group to apply for a loan. 

As the leader, Thach will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy coffee supplies to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Sixto Alberto

texts.es: Sixto tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 5 años de edad. Sixto trabaja como panificador desde hace mucho tiempo lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un baño, un tapial y además desea dar inicio a un muro de retención. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc.
texts.en: Sixto is 35 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner and their 5 year old son. Sixto has worked as a bread baker for a long time because it allows him to bring an income home. With the hope of improving his living conditions, he has made the decision to apply for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a bathroom, a wall, and he also hopes to start building a retaining wall. With the loan he is requesting, he will buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, etc.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, etc to build a bathroom, wall, and to begin a retaining wall.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda tiene 33 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos, en casa familiar, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Zaña y goza con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza Hilda es la crianza y venta de animales, como patos, gallinas y pollos, desde hace 5 años en su propio domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos para engorde de los mismo que le permita ofrecerlo a un mejor precio en los restaurants de su distrito.
texts.en:
Hilda is 33 years old. She lives with her husband and children, in the family home, in a large community in the urban area of Zana. She has good personal and work references from her neighbors. Her town works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock, located in the Chiclayo Province which is in the Lambayeque region, Peru's northern coast.

The work that Hilda does is raising and selling animals, like ducks, hens, and chickens, for 5 years in her own home. She has requested a loan for 1,500 Nuevo Sols from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase food for fattening those animals which will allow her to offer them at a better price in her district's restaurants.

loans.use: to purchase small animals to sell them in the restaurants of her district.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to finish the construction of his house.

loans.name: Saranga Group

texts.en:
Juliana, who is in her mid-forties, is married with three schooling sons.  She has had two businesses: nursery school for teaching kids, and she manage a shop selling new clothes. She has been in business since 2010.  Juliana starts working from 6:00am to 6:00pm per working day and is able to make a fair monthly income.
 
This will be her fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  Juliana used the previous credit, all paid back successfully, to replenish her shop with more fashionable clothes. 

Juliana is really proud that with Kiva's support her shop grew almost 50%.  Juliana managed to earn profit and used it to cover school fees and household expenses. 

In the coming years, Juliana would like to expand her shop capital to go to China to purchase her own stock. She will use the requested credit to buy stocks of clothes to resell.

She will share this loan with her loan group "SARANGA" which consist of two members. The members of this group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy stocks of clothes to resell.

loans.name: Pedro Guadalupe

texts.es: Pedro tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos  de 5 años y 7 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Pedro es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor quien se gana la vida por medio de un molino de nixtamal que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación. Pedro desea reparar el techo de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Pedro is 33 years old and lives in a house that he owns with his wife, and two children, aged seven and five years old each; both of Pedro's children are in school. Perdo is a hard-working and enterprising man who makes a living with a grinder for boiled corn. With a lot of effort, Pedro has managed to set up this business in his home.

Pedro wants to replace the roof on his home and so has applied for a loan from "FUSAI" to buy metal sheeting, wood and nails to carry out the work as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, wood, and nails in order to improve the roof on his home.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is photographed with this adorable newborn piglet; he is an Egyptian Albanian who lives in the suburbia of the city of Korca. 

Many members from his community live here and many practice pig husbandry; at the moment he’s got seven saws, twenty four piglets and two boars. 

Daniel is a 29 year-old married father of a three-year-old boy. His mother, who went blind two years ago, lives with him and his wife and they are her primary caregivers.
 
Daniel is requesting your financial help and he will use this loan to install doors and windows to their family home.

loans.use: to install doors and windows on his poorly built family home.

loans.name: Al- Rehab Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Rehab. It consists of five women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They are applying for a 200,000 YER loan from AMB.

This group’s leader, Amat, is a hardworking woman. She is 38 years old and lives with her family in a poor area in Sana'a. Her husband, who was the family’s sole breadwinner, passed away several years ago. After that, in order to support her children Amat started a small sewing business with a little capital. Thanks to her experience, she was able to start work right away.

Unfortunately, the income from this business is not enough to cover all of the family’s expenses. As a remedy Amat is leading this group in applying for a loan. She will use 50,000 YER to buy more sewing materials such as fabric, buttons, thread and other incidentals.

Amat looks forward to expanding her business in order to better provide for her children.

loans.use: to buy more sewing materials

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Renacer está en su ciclo número 19 del programa de comité de mujeres, cuenta con 20 integrantes actualmente donde todas trabajan y se ayudan mutuamente para salir adelante. Ellas cuentan con actividades comerciales, es un comité muy responsable y tienen un buen comportamiento de pago.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Edith, ella se dedica a la venta de comestibles en una escuela de la ciudad, gracias a los ingresos que ella tiene puede ayudar a su familia económicamente, ella agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser carne, condimentos, hortalizas, verduras y demás, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando y luchando.
texts.en:
The Renacer communal bank is in its 19th cycle with the women’s committee program.  It currently has 20 members.  All of them work and help each other to get ahead.  They have commercial business activities.  It is a very responsible group, and they have good payment behavior.

Edith is one of the members.  She sells food at a school in the city.  Thanks to the income that she has, she is able to help her family financially.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to continue growing.

She is requesting this loan to be able to buy supplies in order to continue making her food.  She will buy things like meat, condiments, greens, vegetables, and other things.  This will allow her to continue working and struggling.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, greens, vegetables, and other things.

loans.name: Lilet

texts.en: Managing a small retail store is Lilet's primary activity within her community. It is her way of helping her husband generate income. Lilet is 45 years old and blessed with seven children. Three of them still attend school. Due to the high cost of school fees, Lilet aims to improve her business and increase her income. She plans to acquire more stock of grocery items to sell but she has inadequate capital. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy smoked fish, eggs, snack foods, canned goods, beverages, seasonings, soft drinks and laundry soap to sell. She hopes that her loan will be a great help for her in improving the business.

loans.use: to buy smoked fish, eggs, snack foods, canned goods, beverages, seasonings, soft drinks and laundry soap to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is from Tumauini, Isabela and is married with four children. She and her husband both work in a private office as well as farm rice. Unfortunately, the couple’s salaries and the income from their farm is not enough to finance their children’s education.

Thus Marilyn is applying for a 10,000 PHP loan through ASKI to pay tuition for her daughter, Ma. Angelica Joyce, who is earning a B.S. in Electronics and Communications Engineering. She chose this educational path because she thinks she’ll earn a good income in her future job and so be able to help her parents. She feels very positive that KIVA lenders will grant her mother’s request.

loans.use: To pay for her daughter's tuition

loans.name: Mirela

texts.en:
This is Mirela, an Egyptian Albanian being photographed with the youngest of her children, her son. She is 35 and has got two children, 12 and 4; she resells used clothes and the photograph is being taken inside the place where she keeps the inventory of the items. She lives in a little town in Central Albania; close by is a Catholic church built some 300 years ago; locals claim that a few people have been cured there.
